  29. Add oil and vegetables: Once the pot is hot, pour in 2 tablespoons of olive oil and add the marinated onions and bell peppers.
  30. Sauté vegetables: Stir the onions and peppers and fry for 3 minutes, until the onions become slightly translucent.
  31. Add chicken: After 3 minutes, add the marinated chicken and stir, making sure it's all broken apart and not stuck together.
  32. Cook chicken: Cook the chicken for 12 minutes, stirring frequently.
  33. Turn off heat: After 12 minutes, the chicken should have a nice color and the spices will have released their flavor and aroma. Turn off the heat.
  34. Assemble fajitas: Spoon guacamole, iceberg lettuce or lettuce of your choice, chopped long red chili (optional), fajita mix, sour cream, fresh grated tasty cheese, and coriander or cilantro (optional) onto warm homemade tortillas (optional).
  35. Roll up fajitas: Grab one end of the tortilla, scrunch in the filling with your hands, and gently roll it up.
  36. Slice the fajitas in half and serve.
  37. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0l8ADpxyNg

chicken_jollof_rice.txt - Chicken Jollof Rice

Objectives

  • Prepare soft and fluffy jollof rice.
  • Sear chicken for a flavorful meal prep.
  • Create a flavorful sauce with a Jamaican curry powder base.

Ingredients

  • 2 red bell peppers or capsicums
  • 1 kilo chicken breast
  • 2.5 grams onion powder
  • 2.5 grams garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • Salt and cracked black pepper
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground coriander
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground yellow mustard
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground fenugreek
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground allspice
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
  • 1 teaspoon ground turmeric
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground chili powder
  • 3 red onions
  • 5 fresh tomatoes
  • 1 habanero (optional)
  • 1 tablespoon neutral flavored oil
  • 1 tablespoon concentrated tomato paste
  • 750 milliliters vegetable or chicken stock
  • 350 grams washed Basmati or Jasmine rice
  • 1 tablespoon unsalted butter (optional)
  • 1 sheet parchment paper (optional)
  • Flat leaf parsley (for presentation)

Instructions

  1. Char red bell peppers over high heat until completely black.
  2. Place charred bell peppers in a bowl, wrap tightly, and steam until soft.
  3. Butterfly and slice chicken breast into two even fillets.
  4. Season chicken with onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, and cracked black pepper.
  5. Combine ground coriander, yellow mustard, fenugreek, allspice, cumin, turmeric, ginger, and chili powder to make Jamaican curry powder.
  6. Roughly chop two red onions.
  7. Slice the remaining red onion thinly in half moons.
  8. Slice fresh tomatoes in half and chop into similar sized pieces as the onions.
  9. Remove charred skin from bell peppers, rinse, and remove stem and seeds.
  10. Combine chopped onions, tomatoes, bell peppers, and any remaining ingredients (including habanero) in a blender until smooth.
  11. Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a high-rimmed pan over medium-high heat.
  12. Sear chicken for 3 minutes per side, removing and resting once cooked.
  13. Add another tablespoon of oil to the pan and sauté sliced red onions until translucent.
  14. Add Jamaican curry powder, bay leaves, and thyme to the pan and cook for 45 seconds to 1 minute.
  15. Stir in tomato paste and cook for 3-4 minutes until oils release.
  16. Add the blended tomato, bell pepper, and habanero mixture to the pan.
  17. Season the sauce with salt, pepper, and sugar to taste.
  18. Bring the sauce to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 15 minutes.
  19. Add chicken stock to the sauce and bring to a boil again.
  20. Stir in washed rice and optional butter.
  21. Bring the rice mixture to a boil again, then place a sheet of parchment paper (Cartouche) over the rice.
  22. Cover the pan with a lid, reduce heat to low, and cook for 20 minutes.
  23. Turn off the heat and let the rice steam for another 10 minutes.
  24. While the rice is steaming, dice the rested chicken.
  25. Remove the lid and parchment paper from the rice.
  26. Gently fluff the rice with a spatula or fork.
  27. Add diced chicken and resting juices to the rice and fold through until combined.
  28. Portion the chicken jollof rice into containers and allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before refrigerating or freezing.
  29. Garnish with flat leaf parsley for presentation.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7XfoFdD174

chicken_kievs.txt - Chicken Kievs

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy chicken kievs with oozing garlic butter.
  • Master the technique for stuffing chicken breasts with garlic butter.
  • Discover how to create a perfect crispy breading for chicken kievs.

Ingredients

Garlic Butter: - 250g (8.8 oz) unsalted softened butter - 10g (0.3 oz) flat leaf parsley - 1/2 shallot, finely diced - 8 cloves garlic, grated - Zest and juice of 1/4 lemon - Salt and cracked black pepper to taste

Chicken Kievs: - 4 medium to large chicken breasts - 4 eggs - 1/4 cup (60ml) whole milk - 1 1/2 cups (180g) plain all-purpose flour - 2 cups (100g) panko breadcrumbs - Salt and cracked black pepper to taste - Vegetable oil for frying

Instructions

  1. Make the garlic butter:
  2. Finely dice 1/2 shallot.
  3. Grate 8 cloves of garlic on a microplane.
  4. Combine softened butter, parsley, diced shallot, grated garlic, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a blender.
  5. Season with salt and pepper.
  6. Blend until smooth.
  7. Prepare the chicken breasts:
  8. Pat chicken breasts dry with paper towels.
  9. Using a sharp knife, cut a pocket along the largest side of each breast, going all the way to the end.
  10. Carefully open the pocket, being careful not to pierce through the chicken.
  11. Fill the chicken breasts:
  12. Transfer the garlic butter to a piping bag fitted with a medium-sized flat nozzle.
  13. Gently pipe the garlic butter into the pockets of the chicken breasts, filling them completely.
  14. Chill the chicken breasts:
  15. Place the stuffed chicken breasts on a tray and freeze for 20 minutes.
  16. Prepare the breading:
  17. Whisk together eggs and milk in a bowl.
  18. Spread flour on a tray and season with desired seasonings.
  19. Spread panko breadcrumbs on another tray and season with desired seasonings.
  20. Breading the chicken:
  21. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
  22. Dredge each chicken breast in flour, then dip in the egg wash, and finally coat with panko breadcrumbs.
  23. Repeat the egg wash and panko breading for a double crumb if desired.
  24. Fry the chicken kievs:
  25. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat until it reaches 180°C (350°F).
  26. Carefully place chicken kievs in the hot oil, ensuring they are submerged.
  27. Fry for about 10 minutes, flipping occasionally to ensure even browning.
  28. Remove chicken kievs from the oil and place on a wire rack to drain.
  29. Serve and enjoy:
  30. Season the cooked chicken kievs with sea salt flakes.
  31. Slice each chicken kiev in half to reveal the oozing garlic butter center.
  32. Serve immediately and enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDWDgz2Xqq0

chicken_korma_curry.txt - Chicken Korma Curry

Objectives

  • Learn to make a flavorful and aromatic Chicken Korma Curry.
  • Master the art of marinating chicken for maximum tenderness.
  • Create a rich and creamy sauce with a blend of spices and nuts.

Ingredients

  • 1 kg (2.2 lbs) boneless and skinless chicken thighs
  • 100 g (3.5 oz) natural Greek yogurt
  • 1.5 tsp (3 g) garam masala
  • 0.5 tsp (1.5 g) turmeric
  • 1 tsp (2.5 g) red chili powder (optional)
  • Pinch of sea salt flakes
  • 3 garlic cloves, peeled
  • 35 g (1.2 oz) ginger, peeled
  • 2 medium brown or yellow onions, peeled
  • 1 long green chili (optional)
  • 20 g (0.7 oz) coriander or cilantro (optional)
  • 2 tbsp (28 g) ghee or clarified butter
  • 3 green cardamom pods
  • 10 g (0.3 oz) blanched or regular almonds
  • 7.5 g (0.2 oz) cashew nuts
  • 70 g (2.4 oz) natural Greek yogurt
  • 2 dried bay leaves
  • 5 whole cloves
  • 1 cinnamon stick
  • 3/4 cup (180 ml) chicken or vegetable stock
  • 1 tsp (2.5 g) garam masala
  • 2 tsp (4 g) coriander powder
  • Pinch of sea salt flakes
  • 200 g (1 cup) washed basmati rice
  • 1 tbsp (14 g) ghee or clarified butter
  • 1 dried bay leaf
  • 1 tsp (3.5 g) whole cumin seeds
  • 3 green cardamom pods
  • 1 star anise
  • 3 whole cloves
  • Pinch of sea salt flakes
  • 2 cups (500 ml) cold water

Instructions

  1. Marinate the chicken: In a bowl, combine chicken thighs, Greek yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, red chili powder (optional), and salt.
  2. Prepare the garlic and ginger paste: Grate garlic and ginger into a paste. Add to the chicken marinade.
  3. Massage the marinade: Massage the marinade into the chicken thighs until well combined. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, up to 48 hours.
  4. Slice the onions: Slice onions in half moon position, then thinly slice across.
  5. Prepare the chili: Slice the green chili in half lengthwise (optional).
  6. Chop the coriander: Roughly chop the coriander or cilantro (optional).
  7. Toast the cardamom and ghee: Heat a large pan over medium-high heat. Add ghee and cardamom pods. Toast for 1 minute.
  8. Sauté the onions: Add sliced onions to the pan and sauté for 4 minutes until soft and translucent.
  9. Toast the nuts: Add almonds, cashews, and salt to the pan. Sauté for 1 minute.
  10. Cool the onion and nut mixture: Transfer the onion and nut mixture to a bowl and let cool for 30 minutes.
  11. Blend the onion and nut paste: Combine the cooled onion and nut mixture with Greek yogurt in a blender. Blend until a thick paste forms.
  12. Toast the spices: Heat the pan over medium-high heat. Add ghee, bay leaves, cardamom pods, cloves, and cinnamon stick. Toast for 1 minute.
  13. Sear the chicken: Move the spices to one side. Add the marinated chicken and any remaining marinade to the pan. Sear for 4 minutes on each side.
  14. Add the onion and nut paste: Add the onion and nut paste to the pan. Pour in the chicken or vegetable stock.
  15. Simmer the curry: Bring the curry to a boil. Add green chili (optional), garam masala, coriander powder, and salt. Simmer for 30 minutes.
  16. Toast the rice: Heat a saucepan over high heat. Add rice, ghee, bay leaf, cumin seeds, cardamom pods, star anise, cloves, and salt. Toast for 1.5 minutes.
  17. Cook the rice: Add cold water to the rice. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 12 minutes.
  18. Rest the rice: Turn off the heat and let the rice rest for 5 minutes.
  19. Fluff the rice: Remove the bay leaf and star anise. Fluff the rice with a spatula or fork. Add coriander (optional).
  20. Serve the curry: Remove the lid from the curry. Add coriander (optional). Serve over rice. Garnish with coriander, chili, or toasted naan bread.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p-Ucqwt5jek

chicken_mushroom_brief_parcel.txt - Chicken Mushroom Brie Parcel

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious chicken mushroom brie parcel.
  • Prepare the chicken and mushroom filling.
  • Assemble and bake the parcel.

Ingredients

  • Chicken
  • Onion powder
  • Garlic powder
  • Smoked paprika
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Oil
  • Garlic
  • Mushrooms
  • Cheese
  • Sundried tomatoes
  • Butter
  • Spinach
  • Felo pastry
  • Egg yolk
  • Milk
  • Sesame seeds
  • Black pepper

Instructions

  1. Add chicken to a bowl with onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper, and oil.
  2. Mix until chicken changes color.
  3. Grate garlic using a microplane to create a paste.
  4. Chop mushrooms.
  5. Slice cheese thinly and roughly chop sundried tomatoes.
  6. Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add oil.
  7. Add chicken and sear for 4 minutes on each side.
  8. Transfer chicken to a 200°C oven for 14 minutes.
  9. Heat another pan over medium heat and add oil and butter.
  10. Add mushrooms, salt, and pepper and sauté for 6-8 minutes.
  11. Add more butter and garlic and sauté again.
  12. Add spinach and allow to wilt.
  13. Rest the chicken for 5 minutes and then thinly slice.
  14. Brush melted butter over felo pastry and add another sheet.
  15. Layer chicken, mushrooms, spinach, cheese, and sundried tomatoes on the pastry.
  16. Season with salt and brush with butter.
  17. Fold the pastry over, tucking in the sides to ensure it is tight.
  18. Brush more butter on top.
  19. Whisk an egg yolk and milk together to make an egg wash.
  20. Brush egg wash over the pastry.
  21. Sprinkle sesame seeds and black pepper on top.
  22. Bake in the oven for 12 minutes.
  23. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LWFyKqNw6Po

chicken_mushroom_spinach_brie_and_sundried_tomato_filo_parcels.txt - Chicken, Mushroom, Spinach, Brie, and Sundried Tomato Filo Parcels

Objectives

  • Learn to make delicious and easy chicken, mushroom, spinach, Brie, and sundried tomato filo parcels.
  • Master the techniques for preparing the chicken, mushroom and spinach filling, and assembling the parcels.
  • Understand the importance of using high-quality ingredients and proper baking techniques for optimal results.

Ingredients

  • 2 large chicken breasts
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Salt and cracked black pepper
  • 3 cloves garlic
  • 100g large cut button mushrooms (or other mushrooms like Swiss Browns, crini, or portobello)
  • Brie cheese (or any good melting cheese)
  • 100g sundried tomatoes (optional)
  • 10 sheets of filo pastry
  • Unsalted butter
  • 1 egg
  • 1/2 tablespoon milk
  • Sesame seeds (white or black)
  • Cracked black pepper (optional)

Instructions

  1. Trim any excess fat from the chicken breasts and add them to a bowl.
  2. Add 1 teaspoon each of onion powder, garlic powder, and smoked paprika, 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and season generously with salt and cracked black pepper.
  3. Mix until the chicken changes color and everything is combined.
  4. Run the garlic cloves along a microplane to create a paste.
  5. Chop the mushrooms to a medium size.
  6. Thinly slice the Brie cheese.
  7. Slice the sundried tomatoes into strips and drain any excess oil.
  8. Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
  9. Add the chicken to the pan and sear for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden brown.
  10. Transfer the chicken to a 200°C (390°F) oven and cook for 14 minutes.
  11. In a separate pan over medium-high heat, melt 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1 tablespoon of unsalted butter.
  12. Add the mushrooms, a pinch of salt, and cracked black pepper to the pan.
  13. Sauté the mushrooms for 6-7 minutes, tossing occasionally, until golden brown and the water has evaporated.
  14. Add 1 tablespoon of unsalted butter and the garlic paste to the pan.
  15. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly, until the garlic is fragrant.
  16. Add 250g of washed baby spinach to the pan and stir until wilted (about 1-2 minutes).
  17. Remove the spinach mixture from the heat and set aside.
  18. After 14 minutes, remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 5-6 minutes.
  19. Slice or shred the chicken.
  20. Brush a little melted unsalted butter around the edges and in the middle of each filo pastry sheet.
  21. Layer the chicken, mushroom and spinach mixture, Brie cheese, sundried tomatoes (optional), cracked black pepper, and sea salt flakes on top of a filo pastry sheet.
  22. Spread more melted butter around the edges and in the middle of the pastry sheet.
  23. Gently fold the pastry sheet over itself, tucking in the sides to create a neat parcel.
  24. Brush the entire parcel with more melted butter.
  25. Repeat steps 20-24 to create 5 filo parcels.
  26. Crack one egg into a bowl and separate the yolk from the white.
  27. Add a splash of milk to the egg yolk and mix with a fork until combined.
  28. Place the filo parcels on a lined baking sheet, ensuring they are not touching.
  29. Brush the egg wash over each parcel, ensuring the top is covered.
  30. Sprinkle sesame seeds and cracked black pepper (optional) over the parcels.
  31. Bake in the oven at 200°C (390°F) for 15-16 minutes until golden brown.
  32. Serve immediately.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JeC1GuQm86g

chicken_mushroom_stew.txt - Chicken and Mushroom Stew

Objectives

  • Create a simple and flavorful chicken and mushroom stew.
  • Utilize a mirepoix for a rich base.
  • Achieve a thickened sauce by searing the chicken and using flour.

Ingredients

  • 400g (14 oz) Swiss brown mushrooms, quartered
  • 1 brown or yellow onion, diced
  • 2 medium carrots, diced
  • 2 ribs of celery, diced
  • 1 potato, peeled and diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped
  • 2 sprigs of flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped (optional)
  • 4 fresh bay leaves (or dried bay leaves)
  • 5 sprigs of thyme, tied together with butcher twine
  • 1.2 kg (2.6 lb) bone-in chicken thighs (skin on preferred)
  • Chicken stock
  • Thickened cream (heavy cream)
  • Olive oil
  • White wine (optional)
  • Flour
  • Butter
  • Salt and pepper

Instructions

  1. Quarter the mushrooms, dice the onion, carrots, celery, and potato into large pieces.
  2. Crush and chop the garlic.
  3. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour.
  4. Sear the chicken in a large pan over medium-high heat until golden brown on both sides.
  5. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
  6. Sauté the mushrooms in the same pan until golden brown and their moisture has evaporated.
  7. Remove the mushrooms and set aside.
  8. Add olive oil and butter to the pan, then sauté the onion, carrots, celery, and potato until softened.
  9. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
  10. Deglaze the pan with white wine and reduce by 2/3.
  11. Add chicken stock, bay leaf bouquet, mushrooms, chicken, and any resting juices to the pan.
  12. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
  13. Stir in thickened cream and cook for 6-8 minutes until thickened.
  14. Remove the bay leaf bouquet.
  15. Season to taste.
  16. Serve with toast, mashed potatoes, or a salad.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t0unBuzvU3c

chicken_nuggets.txt - Chicken Nuggets

Objectives

  • Make crispy, juicy chicken nuggets from scratch
  • Create a homemade mayonnaise sauce with a tangy, spicy flavor
  • Learn how to properly batter and fry chicken nuggets for optimal results

Ingredients

  • 1 kilo (2.2 pounds) chicken mince or ground chicken
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons (20 grams) corn flour or starch
  • 1 teaspoon (5 grams) sea salt flakes
  • Small pinch ground white pepper
  • 1 whole egg
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons (15 milliliters) white vinegar
  • 1 teaspoon (10 grams) Dijon mustard
  • 200 milliliters (210 grams) flavorless olive oil
  • 40 grams (1.4 ounces) American mustard
  • 30 grams (1.06 ounces) sriracha sauce
  • 10 grams (0.35 ounces) oyster sauce
  • 1 tablespoon (20 milliliters) buttermilk (optional)
  • Canola, sunflower, or vegetable oil (enough to fill pan 1/3 to 1/2 full)
  • 1 1/2 cups (210 grams) plain all-purpose flour
  • 1 1/4 cups (150 grams) corn flour or starch
  • 1 tablespoon (8 grams) paprika
  • 2 teaspoons (5 grams) onion powder
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons (7.5 grams) garlic salt
  • 1 3/4 cups (430 milliliters) cold soda water
  • Sea salt flakes (for seasoning)

Instructions

  1. Combine chicken mince, corn flour, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Mix well until ingredients are fully incorporated.
  2. Divide the chicken mixture into desired nugget sizes (approximately 40 grams each). Roll and shape into nuggets.
  3. Place nuggets on baking trays lined with parchment paper, ensuring they don't touch. Freeze for 30-40 minutes to firm up.
  4. To make the mayonnaise: Combine egg, vinegar, Dijon mustard, and olive oil in a tall jar or container.
  5. Blend with an immersion blender on medium speed until emulsified and thick.
  6. Transfer mayonnaise to a clean bowl, scraping the sides to avoid waste.
  7. Add American mustard, sriracha sauce, oyster sauce, buttermilk (optional), and mix well until combined.
  8. Refrigerate mayonnaise until ready to serve.
  9. Heat oil in a pan or pot over medium-high heat to 180 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Fahrenheit).
  10. To prepare the batter: Combine flour, corn flour, paprika, onion powder, and garlic salt in a mixing bowl. Whisk or fork to combine.
  11. Dust frozen chicken nuggets in the seasoned flour mixture, shaking off excess.
  12. Add cold soda water to the flour mixture and whisk until a runny but slightly thick batter forms.
  13. Dip each nugget in the batter, ensuring no dry spots remain.
  14. Gently place 3-4 battered nuggets into the hot oil, away from you to avoid splashback.
  15. Fry for 2 1/2 minutes per side, flipping carefully halfway through.
  16. Remove cooked nuggets from oil and place on a wire rack over a baking tray to drain. Repeat with remaining nuggets.
  17. Lightly season cooked nuggets with sea salt flakes.
  18. Serve chicken nuggets with the homemade mayonnaise.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lf73TeAR8VE

chicken_parmigiana.txt - Chicken Parmigiana

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious marinara sauce from scratch.
  • Prepare crispy, flavorful chicken cutlets.
  • Assemble and bake a classic Chicken Parmigiana dish.

Ingredients

Marinara Sauce:

  • 7 cloves garlic
  • 800 grams (28 ounces) whole tomatoes in their juices
  • 1/2 cup (125 milliliters) water
  • 3 tablespoons (45 milliliters) olive oil
  • 2 teaspoons sea salt flakes
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons cracked black pepper
  • 2 whole stems fresh basil

Breadcrumbs:

  • 6 slices white bread
  • 1 teaspoon sea salt flakes
  • 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
  • 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1/2 teaspoon dried basil
  • 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon cracked black pepper

Chicken:

  • 3 small or 2 large chicken breasts
  • 3 free-range eggs
  • 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) full fat milk
  • 2 cups (240 grams) plain flour
  • 3 tablespoons (45 milliliters) olive oil
  • 1/3 cup (35 grams) fresh parmigiana cheese
  • Mozzarella cheese (amount to taste)

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Fahrenheit).
  2. Prepare the Marinara Sauce:
  3. Crush garlic cloves using the side of a knife.
  4. Chop garlic until finely minced.
  5. Combine tomatoes, water, and garlic in a large mixing bowl.
  6. Mash tomatoes with your hands or a masher.
  7. Heat olive oil in a pan over high heat.
  8. Add garlic and cook for 45 seconds, stirring constantly.
  9. Pour in crushed tomatoes and juices, mixing well.
  10. Bring to a simmer.
  11. Add salt, pepper, and basil stems.
  12. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes, or until thickened.
  13. Prepare the Breadcrumbs:
  14. Slice white bread into strips, then dice into even-sized croutons.
  15. Spread croutons on a baking tray and season with salt.
  16. Bake for 12-14 minutes, or until golden and crunchy, stirring halfway through.
  17. Crush breadcrumbs using a blender, mortar and pestle, or your hands.
  18. Combine breadcrumbs with oregano, thyme, basil, rosemary, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
  19. Prepare the Chicken:
  20. Butterfly chicken breasts by slicing through the center and opening them flat.
  21. Pound chicken breasts to an even thickness using a meat mallet and cling wrap.
  22. Whisk eggs and milk together until smooth.
  23. Dust chicken breasts with flour.
  24. Dip chicken in egg wash, then coat thoroughly in seasoned breadcrumbs.
  25. Repeat for remaining chicken breasts.
  26. Cook the Chicken:
  27. Heat olive oil in a heavy-based skillet over high heat.
  28. Cook chicken for 2 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
  29. Repeat with remaining chicken in batches.
  30. Assemble and Bake:
  31. Place chicken in a baking tray.
  32. Spoon marinara sauce over chicken, coating each piece.
  33. Sprinkle with parmigiana cheese.
  34. Cover chicken with mozzarella cheese.
  35. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until cheese is golden brown.
  36. Serve immediately and enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Yz2B6Od-Hw

chicken_pesto_sandwich.txt - Chicken Pesto Sandwich

Objectives

  • Make a delicious chicken pesto sandwich without a panini press.
  • Learn how to butterfly chicken breasts.
  • Prepare a flavorful pesto from scratch.

Ingredients

  • 1 bunch Basil
  • 10 grams pine nuts (toasted or untoasted)
  • 1 clove garlic
  • Juice of half a lemon (optional: zest)
  • 15 grams Parmesan cheese (freshly grated)
  • 50 milliliters extra virgin olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon sweet paprika
  • 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes (optional)
  • 1 teaspoon dried oregano
  • 2 teaspoons olive oil
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Chicken breast (or thigh, tenderloins)
  • Turkish loaf (or other bread of choice)
  • 2 Tomatoes (or 1 depending on size)
  • 1 bowl of fresh mozzarella cheese

Instructions

  1. Combine basil, pine nuts, garlic, lemon juice (and zest if desired), Parmesan cheese in a food processor.
  2. Blend on high speed until thick.
  3. Scrape down the sides of the processor and add extra virgin olive oil to desired consistency (about 50 milliliters).
  4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  5. Butterfly chicken breasts by placing the palm of your hand on top and cutting horizontally through the center.
  6. Slice the chicken in half through the cut to create two even fillets.
  7. Pound the fillets to flatten them and ensure even cooking.
  8. In a bowl, combine chicken with garlic powder, sweet paprika, chili flakes (optional), dried oregano, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
  9. Mix well to ensure even distribution of flavors.
  10. Heat a large pan over medium-high heat and add 1 tablespoon olive oil.
  11. Add chicken to the hot pan, spreading out the first fillet to move the oil around.
  12. Cook tenderloins (if using) for about 2 minutes per side until cooked through and juicy.
  13. Cook chicken fillets for 3-3.5 minutes per side, achieving a golden crust and juicy center.
  14. Remove tenderloins and fillets from the pan and let rest for 5 minutes.
  15. Slice the Turkish loaf (or chosen bread) in half.
  16. Slice tomatoes into 5-6 thick slices per portion.
  17. Slice mozzarella cheese to the same thickness as the tomatoes (about 4-5 slices per sandwich).
  18. Spread pesto on both sides of the bread.
  19. Layer two chicken fillets on each slice of bread.
  20. Top with mozzarella cheese slices.
  21. Use a blowtorch (or grill/broiler) to melt the cheese and achieve a golden color.
  22. Add tomato slices on top of the melted cheese and season with sea salt flakes and cracked black pepper.
  23. Close the sandwich and press down to compact it.
  24. Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat and add 1 teaspoon of olive oil.
  25. Place the sandwich in the pan, upside down, and press down to compact and ensure even heat.
  26. Toast for 2-2.5 minutes until golden brown.
  27. Carefully flip the sandwich and toast for another 2-2.5 minutes.
  28. Remove from the pan and slice the sandwich in half.
  29. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NTQrpDZXQWE

chicken_py_sandwich.txt - Chicken Py Sandwich

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious and crispy Chicken Py Sandwich.
  • Master the art of creating a flavorful vodka sauce.
  • Understand the importance of properly breading and frying chicken.

Ingredients

English | Chinese ------- | -------- 1 brown or yellow onion | 1个棕色或黄色洋葱 3 cloves garlic | 3瓣大蒜 Mozzarella cheese | 马苏里拉奶酪 2 chicken breasts | 2个鸡胸肉 1 baguette or white loaf | 1个法棍或白面包 Plain flour | 普通面粉 Panko breadcrumbs | 面包糠 Tomato paste | 番茄酱 Chili flakes | 辣椒粉 Butter | 黄油 Dried oregano | 牛至 Dried basil | 罗勒 Cream | 奶油 Salt | 盐 Pepper | 黑胡椒 Vodka | 伏特加

Instructions

  1. Dice the onion into small to medium-sized pieces.
  2. Crush the garlic cloves and chop them into small pieces.
  3. Slice the mozzarella cheese thinly.
  4. Butterfly slice the chicken breasts horizontally.
  5. Slice the baguette or white loaf into four pieces.
  6. In a large pan over medium-high heat, melt 2 tablespoons of butter.
  7. Add the diced onion, a pinch of salt, and 10 cracks of black pepper.
  8. Sweat the onions for 3 minutes, stirring regularly to prevent browning.
  9. Add the garlic and sweat for 1 minute.
  10. Add 100g of tomato paste and a pinch of chili flakes (optional).
  11. Cook for 3 minutes until the tomato paste starts to gain color and release its fragrance.
  12. Add a splash of vodka (2.5 tablespoons recommended) and cook for 1 minute to deglaze the pan.
  13. Add 3/4 cup of thickened cream, salt, and 20 cracks of pepper.
  14. Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to low, and cook for 6 minutes until the sauce thickens.
  15. Set the sauce aside.
  16. Crack two eggs into a bowl and whisk until combined.
  17. In two separate trays or bowls, combine 3/4 cup of plain flour and 1.5 cups of panko breadcrumbs.
  18. Season the flour and breadcrumbs with 1 teaspoon of dried oregano, 1 teaspoon of dried basil, salt, and pepper.
  19. Coat one chicken breast at a time in the flour, then the egg mixture, and finally the breadcrumbs.
  20. Place the coated chicken on a tray and repeat with the remaining chicken.
  21. Heat a large pan with high rims over medium-high heat and add enough oil to fill half the pan.
  22. Heat the oil to 170°C (375°F).
  23. Fry the chicken in batches for 4-5 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden brown and cooked through.
  24. Transfer the cooked chicken to a wire rack over a baking tray to drain excess oil.
  25. Sprinkle the chicken with sea salt flakes.
  26. (Optional) Toast the bread in a pan with 1 tablespoon of butter until golden brown.
  27. Spoon 2-2.5 tablespoons of vodka sauce onto each chicken breast.
  28. Add 3 slices of mozzarella cheese or use packet cheese.
  29. Place the chicken under the grill or broiler at 180°C (350°F) for 5 minutes until the cheese is golden brown.
  30. (Optional) Spread Sundried tomato pesto or basil pesto on the toasted bread.
  31. Spread the remaining vodka sauce on the toasted bread.
  32. Layer the cheesy and crispy chicken on top of the bread.
  33. Garnish with basil leaves (optional) and cracked black pepper.
  34. Place the top bun on the sandwich and press down slightly.
  35. Slice the sandwich in half and enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KkuQv1SuVH8

chicken_sandwich.txt - Chicken Sandwich

Objectives

  • Prepare a flavorful chicken marinade for the sandwich
  • Bake the marinated chicken until cooked through
  • Assemble the sandwich with coleslaw, cheese, and mayo

Ingredients

  • 1-2 long red chilies (seeds in or out)
  • Chicken (amount not specified)
  • Sweet paprika
  • Dried oregano
  • Dry thyme
  • Dried basil
  • Olive oil
  • Lemon zest
  • Garlic cloves
  • Juice of 1 whole lemon
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Cheese (your choice)
  • Buns
  • Butter
  • Coleslaw (from previous video)
  • Mayo

Instructions

  1. Dice 1 or 2 long red chilies, leaving seeds in or out.
  2. Add chicken to a bowl.
  3. Add sweet paprika, dried oregano, dry thyme, dried basil, chilies, olive oil, lemon zest, garlic cloves, and the juice of 1 whole lemon to the bowl.
  4. Season generously with salt and pepper.
  5. Mix everything together until evenly combined.
  6. Let the chicken marinate for 30 minutes.
  7. Place the marinated chicken on a lined baking tray.
  8. Bake in a 200 degree Celsius oven for about 22 minutes.
  9. Once the chicken is cooked, place a slice of cheese of your choice on top.
  10. Return the chicken to the oven to melt the cheese.
  11. Slice the buns in half.
  12. Add butter to a pan and toast the buns to your liking. (Optional: Skip toasting the buns.)
  13. Remove the toasted buns from the pan.
  14. Add coleslaw to the bottom bun.
  15. Place the cooked chicken on top of the coleslaw.
  16. Spread mayo on the top bun.
  17. Stack the buns together to create the sandwich.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mh4rcEZA6Nc

chicken_stir_fry_meal_prep.txt - Chicken Stir Fry Meal Prep

Objectives

  • Prepare a delicious and nutritious chicken stir-fry meal prep.
  • Learn how to cook rice perfectly using a 2:1 ratio.
  • Efficiently prepare and cook all ingredients for a balanced stir-fry.

Ingredients

Rice - 320 grams of washed basmati rice - 640 grams of cold water - Salt to taste

Stir Fry - 1 brown or yellow onion, sliced into thin strips - 2 medium carrots, sliced into thin strips - 2 bell peppers (red and yellow), sliced into strips - Broccolini or broccoli, sliced into bite-sized pieces - 5 cloves of garlic, grated into a paste - 20 grams of ginger, grated into a paste - 900 grams of boneless and skinless chicken thigh, sliced into bite-sized pieces - 125 milliliters of chicken stock - 125 milliliters of light soy sauce - 30 milliliters of rice wine vinegar - 30 milliliters of shaoxing wine - 35 grams of honey - 12.5 milliliters of sesame oil - 17 grams of corn flour - 30 milliliters of peanut oil - Sea salt flakes to taste - Ground white pepper to taste

Instructions

  1. Wash and add 320 grams of basmati rice to a large saucepan.
  2. Add 640 grams of cold water and a pinch of salt to the rice.
  3. Bring the rice mixture to a boil over high heat, stirring to prevent lumps.
  4. Reduce heat to low, cover the pan, and cook for 14 minutes undisturbed.
  5. Remove from heat and let rest with the lid on for 4 minutes.
  6. Fluff the rice with a spatula or fork.
  7. Slice the onion into thin strips.
  8. Slice the carrots into thin strips.
  9. Cut the bell peppers in half, remove the core and seeds, and slice into strips.
  10. Slice the broccolini or broccoli into bite-sized pieces.
  11. Grate the garlic and ginger into a paste.
  12. Slice the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
  13. In a bowl, combine the chicken stock, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, shaoxing wine, honey, sesame oil, and corn flour.
  14. Whisk the sauce mixture until the corn flour is fully incorporated.
  15. Heat a large pan or wok over high heat.
  16. Add 30 milliliters of peanut oil and allow it to heat up.
  17. Add the chicken to the pan and sear for 3 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
  18. Season the chicken with sea salt flakes and ground white pepper.
  19. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
  20. Add the onion and bell peppers to the pan and saute for 3 minutes.
  21. Add the carrots and saute for 2 minutes.
  22. Add the broccolini or broccoli and saute for 2 minutes.
  23. Stir in the garlic and ginger paste and cook for 1 minute.
  24. Add the cooked chicken and any resting juices to the pan.
  25. Fold everything together and cook for 1 minute.
  26. Pour the sauce mixture into the pan and cook for 1.5-2 minutes until thickened.
  27. Remove the stir-fry from the heat.
  28. Divide the stir-fry and rice into 5 portions.
  29. Spoon any leftover sauce over the portions.
  30. Garnish with chili, spring onion, or sesame seeds, if desired.
  31. Allow the meal prep to cool for 30 minutes before storing.
  32. Store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days or in the freezer for up to 4 months.
  33. Reheat in the microwave or a pan.
  34. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7DVxD19BFlg

chicken_stir_fry.txt - Chicken Stir Fry

Objectives

  • Make an easy and flavorful chicken stir-fry.
  • Use minimal ingredients likely found in your pantry.
  • Learn to julienne ginger and spring onions.

Ingredients

  • 1 shallot or small brown/yellow onion
  • 30 grams (0.16 ounce) ginger
  • 4 cloves garlic
  • 3 spring onions/scallions
  • 1 long red chili (optional)
  • 450 grams (15.8 ounces) boneless, skinless chicken thigh
  • 1 tablespoon (20 ml) soy sauce
  • 1 teaspoon (5 ml) sesame oil
  • 1 tablespoon (20 grams) granulated sugar
  • 2 tablespoons (40 ml) peanut oil
  • 450 grams (15.8 ounces) fresh thin hakka noodles
  • 2 tablespoons (40 ml) shaoxing cooking wine or rice wine
  • 1 tablespoon (20 ml) malt vinegar
  • 90 grams (3.1 ounces) fresh bean sprouts

Instructions

  1. Slice the shallot or onion in half through the root, then peel off the skin. Dice into small to medium-sized pieces. Save the root for stock.
  2. Peel the ginger using a spoon. Slice into thin, even strips. Stack the strips in layers of three and julienne them.
  3. Slice the garlic into thin, even slices.
  4. Slice off the roots of the spring onions and save them for stock. Separate the green stems from the roots. Slice the roots as thinly as possible.
  5. Slice the spring onion stems in half vertically. Slice them thinly on a tight angle to create julienne cuts (optional).
  6. Slice the chili into thin strips on an angle to create diamond or oval-shaped pieces (optional).
  7. Slice the chicken thigh into thin, even strips.
  8. Combine the chicken strips with soy sauce, sesame oil, and sugar in a bowl. Mix well to coat. Marinate in the refrigerator for no more than 30 minutes.
  9. Heat a wok or large pan over high heat. Add peanut oil and swirl to coat.
  10. Add the marinated chicken to the hot pan and fry for 2 minutes, stirring regularly. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
  11. Add another tablespoon of peanut oil to the pan. Add the diced shallot/onion and julienned ginger. Fry for 1 minute, stirring regularly, until starting to soften.
  12. Add the sliced garlic and fry for 45 seconds, stirring constantly.
  13. Add the hakka noodles, shaoxing wine, soy sauce, malt vinegar, sugar, and sesame oil to the pan. Stir well to combine.
  14. Add the seared chicken and its marinade to the pan. Stir fry for 2 minutes, breaking up the noodles and ensuring everything is coated in the sauce.
  15. Add the sliced spring onion roots and bean sprouts. Stir fry for 30 seconds until heated through.
  16. Serve immediately, garnishing with the sliced chili and spring onion stems.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQk6OsQd74Y

chicken_stroganov.txt - Chicken Stroganov

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious chicken stroganov with a creamy sauce.
  • Understand the importance of properly searing the chicken and sautéing the vegetables.
  • Explore different variations by using different pasta types.

Ingredients

  • 1 onion
  • 2 cloves garlic
  • 1 lb. mushrooms
  • 1 lb. chicken breasts
  • 1 tbsp. onion powder
  • 1 tsp. garlic powder
  • 1 tsp. smoked paprika
  • 1 tsp. salt
  • 1 tsp. black pepper
  • 1 tbsp. oil
  • 2 tbsp. butter
  • 1 tbsp. Dijon mustard
  • 1/2 cup wine or stock
  • 1 tbsp. flour
  • 1 cup chicken stock
  • 1/2 cup sour cream
  • Cooked pasta of choice
  • Flat leaf parsley

Instructions

  1. Dice the onion into small to medium-sized pieces.
  2. Grate the garlic on a microplane.
  3. Roughly chop the mushrooms.
  4. Butterfly the chicken breasts and slice them into two even fillets.
  5. In a bowl, combine the chicken fillets, onion, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper, and oil. Mix to marinate.
  6. Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
  7. Sear the chicken for about 3 and 1/2 minutes on each side.
  8. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside. Repeat steps 6 and 7 in batches if needed.
  9. Add butter to the pan and melt.
  10. Add the onions and garlic and sauté for about 5 minutes.
  11. Add the mushrooms, salt, and pepper and sauté for another 5 minutes.
  12. Stir in the Dijon mustard and cook for 1 minute.
  13. Deglaze the pan with wine or stock, bring to a boil, and reduce for 1 minute.
  14. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
  15. Add the chicken stock, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low.
  16. Add the sour cream, stir to combine, and cook for 6 minutes.
  17. Slice the cooked chicken and add it to the sauce.
  18. Add cooked pasta of your choice.
  19. Stir to combine and serve in bowls.
  20. Garnish with flat leaf parsley.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XG1njNfdVhk

chicken_tikka_masala.txt - Chicken Tikka Masala

Objectives

  • Marinate chicken thighs in a flavorful yogurt mixture.
  • Sear chicken thighs for a rich flavor.
  • Create a smooth and aromatic tomato-based sauce.
  • Combine marinated chicken with the sauce and simmer until cooked.
  • Garnish with coriander and serve with rice.

Ingredients

  • 1 kilo chicken thigh
  • 3/4 cup plain yogurt
  • 3 teaspoons garam masala
  • 1.5 teaspoons ground cumin
  • 1 teaspoon turmeric
  • 1 teaspoon red chili powder
  • 3 cloves minced garlic
  • 15 grams minced ginger
  • Sea salt flakes to taste
  • 1 tablespoon canola oil
  • 4 tablespoons ghee
  • 2 sliced brown onions
  • 3 minced garlic cloves
  • 15 grams minced ginger
  • 2 teaspoons ground cumin
  • 2 teaspoons ground coriander
  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 1/2 cup water
  • Sea salt flakes to taste
  • 2.5 teaspoons garam masala
  • 1.5 cups thickened cream
  • 2.5 teaspoons sugar
  • Sea salt flakes to taste
  • Coriander for garnish

Instructions

  1. Add 1 kilo chicken thigh to a bowl.
  2. Add 3/4 cup plain yogurt, 3 teaspoons garam masala, 1.5 teaspoons ground cumin, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 teaspoon red chili powder, 3 cloves minced garlic, 15 grams minced ginger, and sea salt flakes to taste.
  3. Mix well to combine.
  4. Wrap tightly and marinate in the fridge for 30 minutes.
  5. Heat a pot over medium-high heat.
  6. Add 1 tablespoon canola oil.
  7. Add the marinated chicken thighs and sear for 4 minutes on each side.
  8. Remove the chicken thighs from the pot.
  9. Melt 4 tablespoons of ghee in the pot.
  10. Add 2 sliced brown onions and saute for 5 minutes.
  11. Add 3 minced garlic cloves and 15 grams minced ginger.
  12. Saute for 45 seconds.
  13. Add 2 teaspoons ground cumin and 2 teaspoons ground coriander.
  14. Toast for 45 seconds.
  15. Add 2 cans diced tomatoes, 1/2 cup water, and sea salt flakes to taste.
  16. Mix to combine and simmer for 8 minutes.
  17. Blend the sauce until smooth.
  18. Add 2.5 teaspoons garam masala, 1.5 cups thickened cream, 2.5 teaspoons sugar, and sea salt flakes to taste.
  19. Mix to combine.
  20. Add the chicken thighs back to the pot.
  21. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes, stirring regularly.
  22. Serve with rice and garnish with coriander.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UVcPP2XzjC0

chicken_wings_recipe.txt - Crispy Fried Chicken Wings

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy, juicy fried chicken wings.
  • Discover the benefits of buttermilk marinating for tender chicken.
  • Understand the importance of proper oil temperature and frying time for achieving crispy results.

Ingredients

  • 1 kg (2.3 lbs) chicken wings
  • 1 3/4 cups (450 ml) buttermilk
  • 2 tsp (6 g) sea salt flakes
  • 1 1/2 tsp (1 g) dried thyme
  • 1 1/2 tsp (1 g) dried basil
  • 1 tsp (0.5 g) dried oregano
  • 1 tbsp (4 g) celery salt
  • 2 tbsp (8 g) garlic salt
  • 1 tbsp (2 g) yellow mustard powder
  • 2 tbsp (2 g) ground white pepper
  • 1 tbsp (1 g) cracked black pepper
  • 4 tsp (5 g) paprika
  • 1 tbsp (1 g) ground ginger
  • 2 cups (256 g) all-purpose plain flour

Instructions

  1. Remove wing tips from chicken wings, if present. You can use these for chicken stock.
  2. Optional: Separate the drumsticks from the wings by cutting through the soft joint.
  3. Place chicken wings in a large bowl and pour buttermilk over them.
  4. Rub buttermilk into the chicken, ensuring it is completely coated.
  5. Wrap the chicken tightly and refrigerate for 8-24 hours (the longer the better).
  6. Heat a large pot with deep sides over high heat, filling it halfway with vegetable, canola, or sunflower oil.
  7. Heat the oil to 180°C (350°F), or until a piece of chicken placed in the oil bubbles fiercely.
  8. In a small bowl, combine all spices: sea salt flakes, dried thyme, dried basil, dried oregano, celery salt, garlic salt, yellow mustard powder, ground white pepper, cracked black pepper, paprika, and ground ginger.
  9. Whisk the spices together thoroughly to ensure no clumps.
  10. In a baking tray or bowl, combine the flour and spice mix.
  11. Coat the marinated chicken in the flour and spice mixture, ensuring it is completely coated.
  12. Shake off any excess flour mixture and place the chicken on a wire rack.
  13. Once the oil reaches the desired temperature, carefully add the coated chicken wings in batches, ensuring not to overcrowd the pot.
  14. Fry the chicken for 7-8 minutes, allowing it to turn golden brown and crispy.
  15. Gently move the chicken around in the oil to ensure even cooking, but avoid touching it too often to prevent breaking the skin.
  16. If using drumsticks, fry for 12-15 minutes. If using breast and thigh, fry for 16-17 minutes.
  17. Prepare a tray with a wire rack to rest the chicken and drain excess oil.
  18. After 8 minutes, carefully remove the crispy chicken from the oil and place it on the prepared tray to drain.
  19. Allow the oil to cool completely before disposing of it properly.
  20. Wait 5-10 minutes for the chicken to cool slightly before serving.
  21. Serve the crispy chicken wings with your favorite dipping sauce.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P12_xc3YyCY

chickpea_curry_meal_prep.txt - Chickpea Curry Meal Prep

Objectives

  • Prepare a delicious and healthy chickpea curry for meal prepping
  • Learn how to cook jasmine rice perfectly
  • Create flavorful and satisfying meal portions for the week

Ingredients

Rice: - 350 grams (12.3 ounces) of washed jasmine rice - 550 milliliters of cold water - 4 fresh kaffir lime leaves (optional, substitute with 1 lime zest) - A pinch of sea salt flakes

Curry: - 2 brown or yellow onions, peeled and diced - 2 medium red bell peppers, sliced or diced - 6 cloves of garlic, minced - 2 tablespoons (40 milliliters) of olive oil - 3 tablespoons (15 grams) of ground cumin - 1.5 tablespoons (12 grams) of paprika - Sea salt flakes to taste - 3/4 cup (180 milliliters) of vegetable or chicken stock - 1.5 cans (600 grams or 1.32 pounds) of diced tomatoes - 2.5 tablespoons (35 grams) of brown sugar - 1.25 cans (500 milliliters or 2 cups) of coconut milk - 2.5 cans (1 kilo or 2.2 pounds) of drained chickpeas - 120 grams (4.23 ounces) of washed baby spinach

Optional: - Wedge of lime - Coriander or cilantro - Natural Greek yogurt

Instructions

  1. Prepare Rice:
  2. Place a large saucepan over high heat.
  3. Add washed jasmine rice and cold water.
  4. Add kaffir lime leaves (optional) and a pinch of salt.
  5. Stir to break up any clumps.
  6. Bring to a boil.
  7. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook undisturbed for 12 minutes.
  8. Remove from heat and let stand covered for 10 minutes.

  9. Discard lime leaves (if used) and fluff rice with a fork.

  10. Prepare Curry:

  11. Heat a large pot over medium-high heat.
  12. Add olive oil and diced onion.
  13. Sweat onion for 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
  14. Add red bell pepper and minced garlic, sweat for another 3 minutes.
  15. Add cumin, paprika, and salt.
  16. Fry for 45 seconds, mixing continuously to toast spices.
  17. Add vegetable or chicken stock, mix for 1 minute.
  18. Add diced tomatoes, brown sugar, and coconut milk.
  19. Mix well and bring to a heavy simmer.
  20. Add drained chickpeas, mix well, and bring to a boil.

  21. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes.

  22. Finish Curry:

  23. Add baby spinach to the simmering curry.
  24. Mix well and cook for 1 minute until wilted.
  25. Adjust seasoning to taste.

  26. Remove from heat.

  27. Assemble Meal Portions:

  28. Place 180 grams (6.35 ounces) of cooked rice in each container.
  29. Add 300 grams (10.5 ounces) of curry to each container.

  30. Optionally serve with a lime wedge, coriander/cilantro, and Greek yogurt (reheat separately).

  31. Store and Reheat:

  32. Refrigerate for up to 3 days or freeze for up to 3 months.
  33. Reheat in the microwave until hot.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy chickpea curry meal prep!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XZ998xfI2v0

chili_cheese_dogs.txt - Chili Cheese Dogs

Objectives

  • Create a quick and easy chili cheese dog recipe.
  • Use readily available ingredients for a delicious meal.
  • Learn to make a flavorful chili sauce from scratch.

Ingredients

  • 1.5 tablespoons olive oil (extra virgin)
  • 300 grams beef mince
  • 1/2 white onion (large dice)
  • Pinch of salt
  • 2 cloves garlic (minced)
  • 7 grams ground cumin
  • 1.5 grams red chili powder
  • 2.5 grams smoked paprika
  • 2.5 grams yellow mustard powder
  • Sea salt flakes (to taste)
  • Cracked black pepper (10 cracks)
  • 15 milliliters apple cider vinegar
  • 6 grams brown sugar
  • 2 grams ground allspice
  • 30 grams ketchup
  • 15 grams yellow mustard
  • 100 grams tomato paste
  • 180 milliliters beef stock
  • 4 cheese kranskies (or other sausage)
  • Hot dog buns
  • American cheddar cheese
  • 1/2 white onion (finely diced)
  • 2 dill pickles (thinly sliced and diced)
  • Flat leaf parsley (optional)

Instructions

  1. Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
  2. Add olive oil and beef mince.
  3. Sear the mince for 2 minutes, creating a crust on the bottom.
  4. Mix well to render fat and develop flavor.
  5. Add minced garlic and cook for 2 minutes until the mince is browned.
  6. Stir in cumin, chili powder, paprika, mustard powder, salt, and pepper.
  7. Cook for 45 seconds to enhance the spice flavors.
  8. Add apple cider vinegar, brown sugar, allspice, ketchup, yellow mustard, and tomato paste.
  9. Mix well to combine all ingredients.
  10. Add beef stock, bring to a boil, and season to taste.
  11. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
  12. Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
  13. Heat the sausage in the oven until hot through.
  14. Slice hot dog buns open, but not all the way through.
  15. Place buns on a baking tray and toast lightly in the oven.
  16. Remove chili from heat and check seasoning.
  17. Add American cheddar to the bottom of the buns, followed by sausage.
  18. Top with more cheese and return to the oven for 2-3 minutes to melt.
  19. Place chili over the sausage, adding more cheese if desired.
  20. Return to oven for a couple of minutes to melt the cheese.
  21. Top with diced white onion, dill pickles, and parsley.
  22. Serve with dipping sauces as desired.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4sN4yzi3lQ

chili_con_carne_stuffed_baked_potatoes.txt - Chili Con Carne Stuffed Baked Potatoes

Objectives

  • Combine chili con carne and baked potatoes for a delicious meal
  • Prepare the ingredients, including onions, garlic, scallions, jalapeno, parsley, and potatoes
  • Cook the chili with beef mince, tomato paste, spices, and diced tomatoes
  • Bake the potatoes and stuff them with chili, cheese, and toppings

Ingredients

  • 1 brown or yellow onion
  • 5 cloves garlic
  • 1 large spring onion or scallion
  • 1 jalapeno (optional)
  • 5 grams flat leaf parsley
  • 4 large potatoes
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Sea salt flakes
  • 10 cracks of black pepper
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 kilo beef mince
  • 2 tablespoons concentrated tomato paste
  • 10 grams ground cumin
  • 1 tablespoon dried oregano
  • 2 teaspoons smoked paprika
  • 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
  • 1/2 cup beef stock
  • 800 grams diced tomatoes
  • 400 grams kidney beans
  • Freshly grated mozzarella cheese
  • Sour cream
  • Sliced green stem spring onion or scallion

Instructions

  1. Prepare the ingredients:
  2. Peel and slice the onion.
  3. Mince the garlic.
  4. Slice the scallion and refrigerate the green stem for garnish.
  5. Slice the jalapeno (optional).
  6. Chop the parsley.
  7. Wash and poke the potatoes with a fork.
  8. Toss the potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
  9. Bake the potatoes:
  10. Place the potatoes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
  11. Bake in a preheated oven at 170 degrees Celsius (340 degrees Fahrenheit) for 45 minutes.
  12. Flip the potatoes after 45 minutes and bake for another 30 minutes.
  13. Make the chili:
  14. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium-high heat.
  15. Saute the onion and scallion for 3 minutes.
  16. Add the minced garlic and jalapeno (optional) and saute for 45 seconds.
  17. Add the beef mince and cook until browned, about 7 minutes.
  18. Stir in the tomato paste, cumin, oregano, paprika, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
  19. Cook for 2 minutes.
  20. Deglaze the pot with beef stock.
  21. Add the diced tomatoes and bring to a boil.
  22. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 40 minutes.
  23. Finish the chili and potatoes:
  24. After 40 minutes, stir in the kidney beans and parsley.
  25. Taste and adjust seasoning.
  26. Simmer for another 20 minutes.
  27. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let cool for 10 minutes.
  28. Preheat the oven broiler.
  29. Assemble and bake the stuffed potatoes:
  30. Cut a cross on top of each potato and push down on the sides to open it up.
  31. Fill the potatoes with chili.
  32. Top with grated mozzarella cheese.
  33. Broil for 6 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
  34. Serve:
  35. Top the stuffed potatoes with sour cream and sliced green scallion.
  36. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWA3KNfOuG8

chili_con_carne.txt - Chili Con Carne

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious and nutritious chili con carne.
  • Understand the importance of browning the beef and vegetables.
  • Discover how to make a flavorful chili sauce.

Ingredients

  • 2 brown or yellow onions
  • 4 cloves garlic
  • 3 spring onions (optional)
  • 2 teaspoons vegetable oil (optional)
  • 1 kilo (80% lean) beef mince
  • 14 grams ground cumin
  • 2 grams red chili powder
  • 7.5 grams smoked paprika
  • 5 grams mustard powder
  • Sea salt flakes
  • Cracked black pepper
  • 200 grams concentrated tomato paste
  • 60 grams tomato ketchup
  • 20 grams yellow mustard
  • 12 grams brown sugar (optional)
  • 3.5 grams ground allspice
  • 30 milliliters apple cider vinegar
  • 350 milliliters beef stock
  • 300 grams washed long grain rice
  • 550 milliliters cold water
  • Sour cream (optional)

Instructions

  1. Dice two brown or yellow onions into medium to large pieces.
  2. Peel and mince four cloves of garlic.
  3. Separate the roots and stems of three spring onions (optional).
  4. Slice the spring onion roots into small circles and the stems on a slight angle.
  5. Heat a large pot over high heat.
  6. Add two teaspoons of vegetable oil (optional) and one kilo of beef mince.
  7. Cook the beef mince for two minutes, then break up the crust and continue cooking for five minutes until browned.
  8. Add the diced onions, spring onion roots, and minced garlic to the pot.
  9. Cook for three minutes until the vegetables are slightly browned.
  10. Add 14 grams of ground cumin, 2 grams of red chili powder, 7.5 grams of smoked paprika, 5 grams of mustard powder, sea salt flakes, and cracked black pepper to taste.
  11. Cook for one and a half minutes until the spices are fragrant.
  12. Add 200 grams of concentrated tomato paste, 60 grams of tomato ketchup, 20 grams of yellow mustard, 12 grams of brown sugar (optional), 3.5 grams of ground allspice, 30 milliliters of apple cider vinegar, and 350 milliliters of beef stock.
  13. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 35-40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  14. While the chili simmers, cook 300 grams of washed long grain rice in 550 milliliters of cold water with sea salt flakes in a saucepan over high heat.
  15. Bring the rice to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 12 minutes undisturbed.
  16. Remove the rice from heat and let it sit for five minutes before fluffing with a fork.
  17. After 35-40 minutes, remove the chili from heat, stir, and adjust seasoning as needed.
  18. Divide the chili and rice into five portions.
  19. Top each portion with sour cream (optional) and garnish with spring onion stems.
  20. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oiW2u72dLII

chili_lemon_chicken_sandwich.txt - Chili Lemon Chicken Sandwich

Objectives

  • Create a quick and easy chicken sandwich recipe.
  • Marinate chicken thighs with chili, paprika, oregano, thyme, basil, garlic, lemon zest, and juice.
  • Prepare a refreshing coleslaw with white and red cabbage, red onion, spring onions, parsley, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, macadamia oil, and honey.
  • Assemble the sandwich with toasted buns, coleslaw, marinated chicken, cheese, and mayonnaise.

Ingredients

Chicken: - 8 large boneless, skinless chicken thighs - 2.5 grams sweet paprika - 0.5 grams dried oregano - 0.5 grams dried thyme - 0.5 grams dried basil - 1-2 chili peppers (adjust to taste) - 2 teaspoons (10 ml) olive oil - 1 lemon, zest and juice - 3 cloves garlic - Salt - Cracked black pepper

Coleslaw: - 100 grams white cabbage - 100 grams red cabbage - 0.5 red onion - 2 spring onions (optional) - 5 grams flat leaf parsley (optional) - 100 grams natural Greek yogurt - 0.5 lemon, juice - 50 ml macadamia oil (or extra virgin olive oil) - 10 grams honey (about 1.5 teaspoons) - Sea salt flakes - Cracked black pepper

Other: - Cheddar cheese slices - Burger buns - Butter (for toasting buns) - Mayonnaise (for sandwich)

Instructions

  1. In a mixing bowl, combine chicken thighs with paprika, oregano, thyme, basil, chili (sliced thinly), olive oil, lemon zest, garlic paste, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well to coat all chicken pieces.
  2. Marinate the chicken in the fridge for 30 minutes to 48 hours, or use immediately.
  3. Preheat oven to 200 degrees Celsius (390 degrees Fahrenheit).
  4. Spread the marinated chicken evenly on a lined baking tray, ensuring no pieces touch.
  5. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or sear in a pan or barbecue.
  6. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the coleslaw.
  7. Finely slice white and red cabbage into chiffonade.
  8. Thinly slice red onion on a slight angle.
  9. Thinly slice spring onions (optional).
  10. Roughly chop parsley (optional).
  11. In a bowl, combine cabbage, red onion, spring onions (optional), parsley (optional), Greek yogurt, lemon juice, macadamia oil, honey, salt, and pepper. Mix well to coat.
  12. Refrigerate the coleslaw until ready to serve.
  13. Once the chicken is cooked, stack two pieces on top of each other per serving.
  14. Top each serving with a slice of cheddar cheese and allow to melt.
  15. Toast burger buns to your liking in a pan with butter.
  16. Assemble the sandwich by layering coleslaw on the bottom bun, followed by the cheesy chicken.
  17. Add mayonnaise to the top bun.
  18. Place the top bun on the sandwich and press down gently to secure.
  19. Enjoy your delicious chili lemon chicken sandwich!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_vubOuu0Rdc

chili_oil.txt - Chili Oil

Objectives

  • Learn to make chili oil from scratch.
  • Understand the importance of using high-quality ingredients.
  • Learn how to store chili oil for optimal freshness.

Ingredients

  • Chili flakes
  • Kashmir chili powder
  • Sugar
  • Sesame seeds
  • 2 cloves of garlic
  • 5 g of ginger
  • Oil
  • Soy sauce

Instructions

  1. Add chili flakes, Kashmir chili powder, sugar, and sesame seeds to a bowl.
  2. Grate two cloves of garlic and 5 g of ginger using a microplane.
  3. Add the grated garlic and ginger to the bowl.
  4. Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
  5. Heat the oil until it starts to bubble gently when a skewer is inserted.
  6. Pour the hot oil into the bowl of dry ingredients.
  7. Let the mixture sizzle for 1 minute.
  8. Add soy sauce to the mixture.
  9. Mix everything together until evenly combined.
  10. Pour the chili oil through a funnel into a jar.
  11. Securely close the jar with a lid.
  12. Refrigerate the chili oil for up to a month.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRH3Gk1WNJ0

chili_scrambled_eggs_on_sourdough.txt - Chili Scrambled Eggs on Sourdough Toast

Objectives

  • Create a flavorful and easy chili scrambled eggs recipe.
  • Learn how to prepare shallots and chili peppers for cooking.
  • Discover a restaurant-style technique for creamy, silky scrambled eggs.

Ingredients

  • 1 shallot
  • 1 long red chili (optional)
  • 6 large free-range eggs
  • 2 tablespoons (40 ml) thickened cream
  • 1 tablespoon (14 grams) clarified butter
  • Pinch of sea salt flakes
  • Bread of your choice (e.g., white loaf sourdough)
  • Butter for spreading on toast
  • Optional toppings: pecorino romano or parmesan cheese, fried shallots, sriracha sauce, coriander or cilantro, black pepper

Instructions

  1. Prepare the shallot: Slice off the tip of the shallot, leaving the root intact. Slice in half and peel, saving the scraps for stock. Make thin slices across the shallot, stopping just before the root. Rotate the shallot 90 degrees and dice into small pieces. Repeat with the other half.
  2. Prepare the chili: Remove the stem from the chili and discard it. Slice the chili thinly across the whole way, either straight or on a slight angle.
  3. Prepare the eggs: Crack 6 eggs into a bowl or jug. Add 2 tablespoons of thickened cream. Beat the eggs and cream together with a fork or whisk until evenly combined.
  4. Cook the shallots and chili: Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of clarified butter and allow it to melt. Add the diced shallots and half of the sliced chili to the pan. Saute for 1.5-2 minutes, stirring regularly, until the shallot is golden and the chili softens.
  5. Prepare the bread: Slice bread of your choice into desired pieces and toast to your preference. Spread butter generously on the toasted bread.
  6. Cook the scrambled eggs: Add the egg and cream mixture to the pan with the sauteed shallots and chili. Scrape the bottom of the bowl to ensure all the mixture is in the pan. Add a pinch of sea salt flakes. Gently fold the eggs over using a silicone spatula, coming in from the sides, until soft, fluffy, and wet curds form. This should take about 30 seconds. Remove from the heat immediately.
  7. Assemble the dish: Place the buttered toast on a plate and gently lay the scrambled eggs on top. Add optional toppings such as cheese, fried shallots, sriracha sauce, coriander or cilantro, and black pepper.
  8. Serve and enjoy: Serve the chili scrambled eggs on sourdough toast immediately.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z3S4_pPXEBU

chili_scrambled_eggs.txt - Chili Scrambled Eggs

Objectives

  • Learn to make delicious chili scrambled eggs.
  • Prepare the shallot, chilli, and eggs for the dish.
  • Cook the eggs to a soft, wet curd consistency.
  • Assemble the dish with toasted bread, parmesan cheese, and sriracha sauce.

Ingredients

  • 1 shallot
  • 1 long red chilli
  • 6 large eggs
  • 2 tablespoons thickened cream
  • 1 tablespoon butter
  • Salt to taste
  • Bread slices
  • Butter for toast
  • Parmesan cheese
  • Sriracha sauce
  • Coriander
  • Cracked pepper

Instructions

  1. Remove the tip of the shallot, slice it in half, peel, and thinly slice across, stopping at the root.
  2. Dice the shallot into small pieces.
  3. Remove the stem from the red chilli and slice it into thin pieces.
  4. Crack six large eggs into a bowl.
  5. Add two tablespoons of thickened cream to the bowl.
  6. Beat the eggs and cream together until smooth.
  7. Place a pan over medium-high heat.
  8. Add one tablespoon of butter to the pan.
  9. Add the diced shallot and half of the sliced chilli to the pan.
  10. Sauté the shallot and chilli for three minutes.
  11. Toast as many slices of bread as desired.
  12. Spread butter on the toasted bread.
  13. Add the egg mixture to the pan.
  14. Season with salt to taste.
  15. Mix and cook the eggs for 30 seconds, until soft and wet curds form.
  16. Remove the eggs from the pan.
  17. Serve the eggs on the toasted bread.
  18. Grate parmesan cheese over the eggs.
  19. Garnish with the remaining sliced chilli, crispy shallots, sriracha sauce, coriander, and cracked pepper.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vADqEF2X388

chillba_recipe.txt - Chillba

Objectives

  • Learn to make a delicious and easy chillba recipe.
  • Discover a unique way to roast garlic.
  • Master the art of poaching eggs.

Ingredients

  • 1 bulb of garlic
  • Olive oil
  • Plain yogurt
  • Roasted garlic cloves
  • Lime zest
  • Lemon zest
  • Lemon juice
  • Salt
  • Ground white pepper
  • Butter
  • Paprika
  • Chili flakes
  • Bread of your choice
  • Olive oil (for toasting bread)
  • Vinegar (optional)
  • Eggs
  • Squeezable garlic
  • Dill
  • Flat leaf parsley
  • Cracked black pepper

Instructions

  1. Drizzle a bulb of garlic with olive oil and wrap it in foil.
  2. Roast in the oven at 180°C for 45 minutes.
  3. In a bowl, combine yogurt, roasted garlic cloves, lime zest, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, and ground white pepper.
  4. Mix well and set aside.
  5. Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
  6. Add butter to the pan and let it melt.
  7. Add paprika and chili flakes to the melted butter.
  8. Turn off the heat and let the mixture cook for 2 minutes.
  9. Remove from heat.
  10. Toast bread of your choice to your liking.
  11. Bring a pot of water to a boil.
  12. Add vinegar (optional) to the boiling water.
  13. Poach eggs for 2.5 minutes until soft.
  14. Let the roasted garlic cool and then slice it in half.
  15. Spread the squeezable garlic onto the toasted bread.
  16. Spread the Citrus yogurt onto the toast.
  17. Stack the toasted bread on a plate.
  18. Top with the poached eggs.
  19. Drizzle with the chili paprika butter.
  20. Garnish with dill, flat leaf parsley, and cracked black pepper.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBNiCayCPyk

chilli_stuffed_sweet_potatoes.txt - Chilli Stuffed Sweet Potatoes

Objectives

  • Prepare sweet potatoes for baking.
  • Saute onions and garlic.
  • Brown beef mince and add spices.
  • Simmer the chilli with crushed tomatoes and beef stock.
  • Stuff the sweet potatoes with the chilli mixture.
  • Grill the stuffed potatoes until cheese is melted.

Ingredients

  • 5 sweet potatoes
  • 2 teaspoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper
  • 1.5 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 diced onion
  • 3 cloves minced garlic
  • 1 jalapeno
  • 500 grams beef mince
  • 1 tablespoon tomato paste
  • 2 teaspoons cumin
  • 2 teaspoons dried oregano
  • 1 teaspoon smoked paprika
  • 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 3/4 cup beef stock
  • 1 can crushed or diced tomatoes
  • 1 can kidney beans
  • 5 grams chopped parsley
  • Grated cheddar or mozzarella cheese
  • Spring onion

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
  2. Poke holes in 5 sweet potatoes with a fork.
  3. Place potatoes on a baking tray, drizzle with 2 teaspoons olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
  4. Bake for 1 hour.
  5. Heat 1.5 tablespoons olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
  6. Add 1 diced onion and saute for 3 minutes.
  7. Add 3 cloves minced garlic, 1 jalapeno, and salt to taste.
  8. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
  9. Add 500 grams of beef mince, break it up, and cook for 6 minutes or until browned.
  10. Add 1 tablespoon tomato paste, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, and salt and pepper to taste.
  11. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
  12. Pour in 3/4 cup of beef stock and reduce for 1 minute.
  13. Add 1 can of crushed or diced tomatoes, mix well, and bring to a boil.
  14. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 25 minutes.
  15. Remove potatoes from oven and let them cool slightly.
  16. Remove the lid from the chili and add 1 can of kidney beans and 5 grams of chopped parsley.
  17. Mix well.
  18. Slice the potatoes lengthways and open them up.
  19. Add the chili mixture on top of the potatoes.
  20. Sprinkle with grated cheddar or mozzarella cheese.
  21. Grill or broil for 6 minutes or until cheese is melted.
  22. Place the stuffed potatoes in containers.
  23. Top with extra chili, spring onion, and enjoy.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iM2LdF5VIUM

chimichurri_chicken_and_rice.txt - Chimichurri Chicken and Rice

Objectives

  • Prepare a delicious and easy chimichurri chicken and rice meal.
  • Learn how to cook basmati rice using a simple two-to-one ratio method.
  • Create a flavorful chimichurri sauce with fresh herbs and spices.

Ingredients

Rice - 320 grams (11.2 ounces) basmati rice, washed - 640 grams (640 milliliters) cold water - Sea salt flakes to taste

Chicken - 1 kilo (2.2 pounds) chicken breast - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) onion powder - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) garlic powder - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) smoked paprika - Sea salt flakes to taste - Cracked black pepper (10 cracks) - 2 teaspoons (10 milliliters) olive oil

Chimichurri - 10 grams (0.3 ounces) flat leaf parsley - 10 grams (0.3 ounces) coriander (optional) - 3 cloves garlic, peeled - 1 teaspoon (2 grams) dried oregano - 1/4 teaspoon (0.2 grams) dried chili flakes (optional) - 1/3 cup (80 milliliters) extra virgin olive oil - 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) red wine vinegar - Sea salt flakes to taste - Cracked black pepper (20 cracks)

Instructions

  1. Place a saucepan over high heat.
  2. Add washed basmati rice and cold water in a 2:1 ratio.
  3. Add sea salt flakes to taste and stir to break up any clumps.
  4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and cook undisturbed for 14 minutes.
  5. In a mixing bowl, combine chicken breast with onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, salt, pepper, and olive oil.
  6. Massage the chicken until all ingredients are well combined.
  7. Heat a large pan over high heat and add olive oil.
  8. Once hot, add the seasoned chicken pieces, leaving space between each.
  9. Sear for 3 minutes on each side until golden brown.
  10. Transfer the chicken to a preheated oven (200 degrees Celsius/390 degrees Fahrenheit) and bake for 13 minutes.
  11. While the chicken bakes, prepare the chimichurri.
  12. In a blender, combine parsley, coriander (optional), garlic, oregano, chili flakes (optional), olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper.
  13. Blend on high until smooth and combined.
  14. After 14 minutes, remove the rice from heat and keep it covered for 4 minutes.
  15. Fluff the rice with a fork or spatula.
  16. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes.
  17. Slice the chicken across the grain and then into large diced pieces.
  18. Combine the diced chicken with any resting juices in a mixing bowl.
  19. Add the chimichurri to the chicken and mix well.
  20. Divide the rice and chimichurri chicken into 5 portions.
  21. Spoon any remaining juices from the mixing bowl over the portions.
  22. Serve with lemon slices and coriander (optional) as garnish.
  23. Store leftovers in the refrigerator for up to 4 days or in the freezer for up to 4 months.
  24. Reheat in the microwave or a pan until hot.
  25. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NDCi8pPgSL0

chinese_chicken_wings.txt - Chinese Chicken Wings

Objectives

  • Learn to make easy and flavorful Chinese chicken wings.
  • Prepare a marinade that enhances chicken flavor and creates a beautiful caramelization.
  • Understand the importance of proper marinating time and oven baking techniques.

Ingredients

  • 1.2 kilos chicken wings
  • 10 milliliters sesame oil
  • 40 milliliters xiaoxing wine (or chicken stock)
  • 40 milliliters soy sauce (or reduced sodium soy sauce)
  • 25 grams brown sugar (or white sugar)
  • 30 grams oyster sauce
  • 30 grams hoisin sauce
  • 60 grams tomato ketchup
  • 20 grams Olek (chili sauce or paste)
  • 1 gram Chinese five spice powder
  • 5 cloves garlic
  • 20 grams ginger
  • Spring onion (optional)
  • Bird's eye chili (optional)
  • Sesame seeds (optional)

Instructions

  1. Separate the chicken wings into wingettes and drumettes.
  2. In a bowl, combine sesame oil, xiaoxing wine, soy sauce, brown sugar, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, tomato ketchup, Olek, and Chinese five spice powder.
  3. Finely grate garlic and ginger into the marinade.
  4. Whisk the marinade until all ingredients are well combined.
  5. Add the chicken wings to the marinade and ensure they are fully coated.
  6. Marinate for 20-30 minutes.
  7. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
  8. Remove chicken wings from marinade and drain excess marinade.
  9. Place wings on a baking tray, ensuring they are not overlapping.
  10. Bake for 20 minutes on the top shelf of the oven.
  11. While the wings bake, thinly slice spring onion and bird's eye chili (if using).
  12. After 20 minutes, brush the remaining marinade onto the chicken wings.
  13. Bake for an additional 10 minutes, then brush with marinade again.
  14. Bake for a final 10 minutes.
  15. Serve the chicken wings hot, drizzled with any leftover marinade.
  16. Garnish with sliced spring onion, chili, and toasted sesame seeds (optional).

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VICCf19bhYA

chipotle_mayo.txt - Chipotle Mayo

Objectives

  • Create a flavorful Chipotle Mayo from scratch.
  • Learn how to use an immersion blender for quick and easy emulsification.
  • Discover versatile uses for this homemade sauce.

Ingredients

  • 1 egg
  • 1 tablespoon white vinegar
  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard or American mustard
  • 1 tablespoon neutral flavored oil (e.g., vegetable oil)
  • 1 tablespoon tomato sauce
  • 1 tablespoon El Chipotle in Adobo sauce
  • 1 tablespoon American mustard (yellow mustard)
  • 1 slice dill pickle, chopped
  • Salt
  • Cracked black pepper

Instructions

  1. Combine the egg, white vinegar, Dijon mustard, and oil in a jar or container.
  2. Use an immersion blender to blend the ingredients until they emulsify and form a basic mayonnaise.
  3. Add the tomato sauce, El Chipotle in Adobo sauce, American mustard, and chopped dill pickle to the mayonnaise.
  4. Season with salt and cracked black pepper to taste.
  5. Use the immersion blender to blend everything together until all flavors are combined.
  6. Enjoy this flavorful Chipotle Mayo on a patty melt or other dishes of your choice.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iitVTBsHNZs

chizo_pasta.txt - Chili Chizo Pasta

Objectives

  • Learn to make a simple and delicious chili chizo pasta in under 15 minutes.
  • Master the technique of rendering fat from chizo sausage.
  • Create a flavorful sauce with crushed tomatoes, pickled chilies, and sugar.

Ingredients

  • 3 chizo sausages (paprika chizo recommended)
  • 3 pickled chilies
  • 300g rigatoni or penne pasta (or any pasta of choice)
  • 1 can (400g) crushed tomatoes (or fresh cherry tomatoes)
  • 5g sugar (optional)
  • Salt and cracked black pepper
  • 10g fresh basil leaves
  • Grated parmesan cheese (optional)

Instructions

  1. Squeeze the meat out of the chizo sausage skins and discard the skins.
  2. Chop the pickled chilies into small to medium-sized pieces.
  3. Bring a pot of salted water to a boil over high heat.
  4. Add the pasta to the boiling water and cook for 1 minute less than the packet instructions.
  5. Heat a pan over medium-high heat and add the chizo sausage.
  6. Cook the chizo for 3 minutes until golden brown and the fat has rendered out.
  7. Add the crushed tomatoes, pickled chilies, sugar, salt, and cracked black pepper to the pan.
  8. Bring the sauce to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
  9. Stir in the fresh basil leaves and let them wilt in the sauce.
  10. Scoop out 1 cup of the pasta water and set aside.
  11. Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce.
  12. Add half of the reserved pasta water to the sauce and mix well.
  13. Continue mixing over low heat until the sauce coats the pasta.
  14. Adjust seasoning as needed.
  15. Serve in bowls and garnish with grated parmesan cheese, fresh basil leaves, and cracked black pepper.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hNtT-SyHceU

chizo_pickled_chili_pasta.txt - Chizo and Pickled Chili Pasta

Objectives

  • Learn how to make a Chizo and Pickled Chili Pasta dish.
  • Understand the ingredients and steps involved in the recipe.

Ingredients

  • Chizo
  • Pickled Chili
  • Pasta

Instructions

  1. Gather the ingredients for the Chizo and Pickled Chili Pasta.
  2. Prepare the pasta according to package instructions.
  3. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the Chizo and Pickled Chili ingredients as needed.
  4. Combine the cooked pasta, Chizo, and Pickled Chili in a bowl.
  5. Toss to coat the pasta in the Chizo and Pickled Chili sauce.
  6. Serve the Chizo and Pickled Chili Pasta immediately.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfnAS7AUbgw

chocolate_brownies.txt - Chocolate Brownies

Objectives

  • Learn to make fudgy chocolate brownies using a double boiler
  • Understand the importance of using monk fruit sweetener and almond flour
  • Create a decadent dessert that is healthy and satisfying

Ingredients

  • 1 cup coconut oil
  • 1 cup dark chocolate chips
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/2 cup monk fruit sweetener
  • 1 cup almond flour
  • 1/4 cup cacao powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon sea salt flakes
  • 1/4 cup chocolate chips (for sprinkling)

Instructions

  1. Create a double boiler or bain-marie over medium heat.
  2. Add the coconut oil and dark chocolate chips to the double boiler and melt slowly and gently.
  3. Set the melted chocolate aside.
  4. In a stand mixer bowl, add the eggs and monk fruit sweetener.
  5. Attach the whisk attachment to the stand mixer and mix for five minutes until the mixture is light and fluffy.
  6. Remove the bowl from the stand mixer and add the almond flour, cacao powder, melted chocolate, and sea salt flakes.
  7. Mix until the ingredients are well combined and smooth.
  8. Transfer the batter to a lined baking pan and spread it out evenly, ensuring it sits flat.
  9. Sprinkle the top of the batter with additional chocolate chips.
  10. Bake in a 180 degree oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a skewer inserted into the center comes out slightly soft.
  11. Remove the brownies from the oven and allow them to cool for 10 minutes before slicing.
  12. Enjoy your delicious and healthy chocolate brownies.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lyStsDxrlEs

chocolate_coffee_tart.txt - Chocolate Coffee Tart

Objectives

  • Make a delicious chocolate coffee tart with a crunchy biscuit base.
  • Create a smooth and flavorful chocolate coffee ganache.
  • Learn to whip egg whites into a stable meringue for a perfect topping.
  • Toast the meringue for a delightful marshmallow flavor.

Ingredients

Base: - 275 grams (9.7 ounces) digestive biscuits - 90 grams (3.1 ounces) melted unsalted butter - 1/2 teaspoon (2.5 grams) sea salt flakes

Ganache: - 350 grams (12 ounces) dark chocolate chips or pieces - 2.5 tablespoons (35 grams) cubed unsalted butter - 3.5 tablespoons (20 grams) fresh and finely ground coffee - 2 tablespoons (40 milliliters) water - 1 1/4 cups + 1 tablespoon (330 milliliters) heavy thickened cream

Meringue: - 4 large free-range egg whites - 3/4 cup (160 grams) caster sugar or fine sugar - Pinch of sea salt flakes

Instructions

  1. Combine digestive biscuits, melted butter, and salt in a food processor.
  2. Process until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
  3. Press the crumb mixture into a lightly buttered 24-centimeter pie dish, ensuring it's firmly packed and extends up the sides.
  4. Refrigerate the base for at least one hour or overnight.
  5. While the base chills, prepare the ganache. Combine dark chocolate chips, cubed butter, and fresh ground coffee in a mixing bowl.
  6. In a small saucepan, heat water, heavy cream, and coffee until hot but not simmering.
  7. Pour the hot coffee cream mixture over the chocolate and butter, stirring until smooth.
