  16. Add pasta to boiling water and cook for 1 minute less than package instructions.
  17. Add onion powder, paprika, oregano, and basil to the beef mince.
  18. Cook for 4 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  19. Add the romesco sauce to the beef mince and cook for 2 minutes until thickened.
  20. Drain the pasta and add it to the sauce.
  21. Cook for 1-2 minutes until the pasta is coated in sauce.
  22. Portion the pasta into containers and garnish with Parmesan cheese (optional).
  23. Allow the pasta to cool for 15-20 minutes before storing in the fridge for up to 4 days or the freezer for up to 4 months.
  24. Reheat in the microwave or on the stovetop.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eiYltT920EI

creamy_garlic_pasta.txt - Creamy Garlic Pasta

Objectives

  • Prepare a creamy garlic pasta sauce
  • Cook pasta al dente
  • Combine sauce with pasta and cheese

Ingredients

  • 1 teaspoon butter
  • 1 teaspoon olive oil
  • 6 cloves minced garlic
  • 400 mL thickened cream or whipping cream
  • Sea salt flakes
  • Cracked black pepper
  • 120 g baby spinach
  • 60 g Grana Padano cheese
  • Chopped parsley
  • Extra virgin olive oil

Instructions

  1. Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a boil over high heat.
  2. Add a generous amount of salt to the boiling water.
  3. Add pasta to boiling water and cook one minute less than the packet instructions.
  4. While pasta is cooking, heat butter and olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
  5. Add minced garlic to the pan and sauté for 45 seconds.
  6. Pour in thickened cream or whipping cream, season with salt, pepper, and mix well.
  7. Bring the cream mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes or until thickened.
  8. Add baby spinach to the sauce and cook for 1 minute until wilted.
  9. Drain the pasta and add it directly to the sauce.
  10. Add Grana Padano cheese to the pasta and sauce mixture and stir to combine.
  11. Continue cooking for 1 minute while checking seasoning.
  12. Serve the pasta in bowls or plates and garnish with additional Grana Padano cheese, chopped parsley, pepper, and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mTySj6rw8-w

creamy_garlic_rose_pasta.txt - Creamy Garlic Rose Pasta

Objectives

  • Create a quick, easy, and cheap pasta dish with a creamy garlic rose sauce.
  • Use simple ingredients to build a complex and flavorful sauce.
  • Learn how to cook pasta al dente and incorporate it into a sauce.

Ingredients

  • 1/2 brown or yellow onion, thinly sliced
  • 10 grams (0.3 ounces) fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped
  • 4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced
  • 500 grams (1.1 pounds) penne pasta
  • 1 1/2 tablespoons (30 milliliters) olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons (40 milliliters) white wine or vegetable stock
  • 1 1/2 cans (600 grams or 1.3 pounds) diced tomatoes
  • 3 basil stems
  • Sea salt flakes to taste
  • 10 cracks black pepper (or more)
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons (7 grams) sugar
  • 180 milliliters (3/4 cup) thickened cream, whipping cream, or heavy cream
  • Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, grated (optional)
  • Extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling (optional)

Instructions

  1. Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil over high heat. Generously season with sea salt.
  2. Add the pasta to the boiling water and cook for one minute less than the package instructions.
  3. While the pasta is cooking, heat a large, high-rimmed pan over medium-high heat.
  4. Add the olive oil to the pan and sauté the diced onion for 2 minutes, or until slightly golden and translucent.
  5. Add the thinly sliced garlic and sauté for 45 seconds, stirring constantly to prevent burning.
  6. Deglaze the pan with white wine or vegetable stock and reduce for 30 seconds, stirring regularly.
  7. Add the diced tomatoes, basil stems, sea salt flakes, black pepper, and sugar to the pan. Stir to combine and bring to a boil.
  8. Add the cream to the sauce and stir until fully combined.
  9. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 6 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked.
  10. Remove the basil stems from the sauce.
  11. Using a kitchen spider or slotted spoon, transfer the cooked pasta directly from the saucepan to the sauce, bringing some of the pasta water with it. Reserve some pasta water for adjusting the sauce later.
  12. Add the roughly chopped basil to the sauce and stir to combine.
  13. Adjust the sauce with reserved pasta water to ensure it coats the pasta.
  14. Season with additional salt and pepper as needed.
  15. Remove the pasta from the heat.
  16. To serve, divide the pasta among bowls.
  17. Grate Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese over the pasta, if desired.
  18. Crack black pepper over the pasta.
  19. Garnish with thinly sliced basil.
  20. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.
  21. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7H6bXODix2w

creamy_honey_mustard_chicken_and_mushrooms.txt - Creamy Honey Mustard Chicken and Mushrooms

Objectives

  • Learn to make a flavorful and easy creamy honey mustard chicken and mushroom dish.
  • Understand the importance of marinating the chicken for enhanced flavor.
  • Master the art of cooking mushrooms and chicken to perfection.

Ingredients

  • Chicken
  • Mushrooms (quartered or sliced)
  • Garlic (roughly chopped or grated)
  • Thyme (roughly chopped, remove woody stems)
  • Dijon mustard
  • Seeded mustard
  • Honey
  • Salt
  • Cracked black pepper
  • Olive oil
  • Chicken stock
  • Cream

Instructions

  1. Quarter or slice mushrooms.
  2. Roughly chop or grate garlic.
  3. Roughly chop thyme, removing woody stems.
  4. Place chicken in a bowl.
  5. Add garlic, Dijon mustard, seeded mustard, and honey to the bowl.
  6. Season with salt and cracked black pepper.
  7. Mix ingredients to combine.
  8. Marinate the chicken or use it straight away.
  9. Place a pot over medium-high heat.
  10. Add olive oil to the pot.
  11. Add mushrooms, salt, and pepper to the pot.
  12. Sauté mushrooms for 6-7 minutes until golden.
  13. Remove mushrooms from the pot.
  14. Add olive oil to the same pot.
  15. Add chicken to the pot and fry for 3-4 minutes per side.
  16. Add remaining marinade, chicken stock, and cook for 1 minute.
  17. Add cream to the pot.
  18. Add thyme and season with salt and cracked black pepper.
  19. Bring the mixture to a simmer.
  20. Cook over low heat for 10 minutes.
  21. Add the mushrooms back to the pot.
  22. Cook for 2 more minutes.
  23. Serve with your favorite sides.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ohj92qVJGaw

creamy_mustard_chicken.txt - Creamy Mustard Chicken

Objectives

  • Create a rich, creamy, garlicky mustard chicken dish.
  • Learn how to sear chicken thighs for a crispy exterior and tender interior.
  • Utilize bacon fat to enhance the flavor of the sauce.

Ingredients

  • 1 brown onion
  • 5 grams fresh flat leaf parsley
  • 4 grams or 5 sprigs fresh thyme
  • 5 large cloves garlic
  • 200 grams streaky bacon
  • 1 tablespoon (15 ml) olive or vegetable oil
  • 1 kilo (2.2 pounds) chicken thighs
  • 1 teaspoon sea salt flakes
  • 1 teaspoon (10 cracks) black pepper
  • 2 tablespoons (28 grams) clarified unsalted butter
  • 80 ml white wine, vegetable, or chicken stock
  • 500 ml thickened cream
  • 2.5 tablespoons (60 grams) Dijon mustard
  • 0.5 cup (50 grams) fresh Parmesan cheese
  • 80 grams (2 cups) baby spinach

Instructions

  1. Slice the end off of one brown onion and slice it in half through the root.
  2. Peel off the skin and save it for stock.
  3. Thinly slice the onions, stopping just before the root.
  4. Slice the onion in half again, stopping at the root.
  5. Finely dice the onion, trimming off any excess flesh from around the root.
  6. Save the roots for stock.
  7. Chop the parsley and thyme roughly.
  8. Grate the garlic on a microplane or grater until it resembles a paste.
  9. Slice the bacon into medium-sized strips.
  10. Rotate the bacon strips 90 degrees and dice them into medium-sized pieces.
  11. Heat a large heavy base pot or skillet over medium to high heat.
  12. Add 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of olive or vegetable oil to the pot.
  13. Carefully place the chicken thighs flat side down and sear them for 7 minutes.
  14. Flip the chicken thighs and repeat the process for another 7 minutes.
  15. Season the chicken with 1 teaspoon of sea salt flakes and 1 teaspoon (10 cracks) of black pepper.
  16. Remove the chicken from the pot and place it in a bowl to rest.
  17. Add another 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of olive or vegetable oil to the pot.
  18. Add the diced bacon and fry it for 3-4 minutes until crispy.
  19. Remove the bacon with a slotted spoon and place it in a bowl.
  20. Add 2 tablespoons (28 grams) of clarified unsalted butter to the pot and allow it to melt.
  21. Add the diced onions and saute them for 3-4 minutes until golden and translucent.
  22. Add the chopped parsley, thyme, and minced garlic and saute for 15 seconds.
  23. Pour in 80 ml of white wine, vegetable, or chicken stock and deglaze the pot.
  24. Reduce the sauce for 1 minute.
  25. Pour in 500 ml of thickened cream, 2.5 tablespoons (60 grams) of Dijon mustard, and mix well.
  26. Bring the sauce to a simmer.
  27. Grate in 0.5 cup (50 grams) of fresh Parmesan cheese and mix it through.
  28. Season the sauce with 1 teaspoon of sea salt flakes and 1 teaspoon (10 cracks) of black pepper.
  29. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the sauce for 7 minutes.
  30. Add the cooked chicken thighs and any accumulated juices to the sauce.
  31. Add the diced crispy bacon and mix everything well.
  32. Simmer the sauce for another 6 minutes until well reduced and thick.
  33. Add 80 grams (2 cups) of baby spinach and mix until wilted.
  34. Turn off the heat and remove the pot from the stovetop.
  35. Serve the chicken thighs with the sauce, garnished with Parmesan cheese, black pepper, and parsley.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBlnMy-QWfY

creamy_peppercorn_chicken_pasta.txt - Creamy Peppercorn Chicken Pasta

Objectives

  • Learn to make a quick and easy creamy peppercorn chicken pasta recipe.
  • Master the technique of butterflying chicken breasts.
  • Understand how to create a flavorful and rich sauce.

Ingredients

  • 1 small brown or yellow onion
  • 2 large cloves of garlic
  • 5 grams (0.2 ounces) of flat leaf parsley
  • 2 large chicken breasts (500 grams / 1.1 pounds)
  • 1.5 teaspoons (3.5 grams) of onion powder
  • 1.5 teaspoons (3.5 grams) of garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon (5 grams) of sea salt flakes
  • 20 cracks of black pepper
  • 1 teaspoon (5 milliliters) of olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons (28 grams) of clarified butter
  • 450 grams (1 pound) of pasta
  • 2.5 tablespoons (35 grams) of drained green peppercorns
  • 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) of white wine or chicken stock
  • 375 milliliters (1.5 cups) of thickened cream
  • Parmesan cheese (optional)

Instructions

  1. Slice the onion in half through the root, peel off the skin, and dice into even sized pieces.
  2. Slice the garlic into thin strips.
  3. Roughly chop the parsley.
  4. Butterfly the chicken breasts, slice them in half horizontally, and season with onion powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and olive oil.
  5. Heat a large pan over high heat and sear the chicken for 3 minutes per side, then set aside to rest for 10 minutes.
  6. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions.
  7. Add the diced onion to the hot pan and saute for 2 minutes.
  8. Add the green peppercorns and saute for 1 minute.
  9. Add the sliced garlic and saute for 45 seconds.
  10. Deglaze the pan with white wine or chicken stock and cook for 1 minute.
  11. Add the thickened cream, salt, pepper, and parsley (if using) and simmer for 6-7 minutes.
  12. Slice the rested chicken into thin strips.
  13. Add the chicken and any resting juices to the sauce and mix well.
  14. Add the cooked pasta to the sauce along with some pasta water.
  15. Mix well, adjust seasoning, and serve.
  16. Garnish with parsley and parmesan cheese (optional).

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SbjdmKesVKU

creamy_rose_pasta.txt - Creamy Rose Pasta

Objectives

  • Prepare a flavorful and creamy rose pasta dish.
  • Learn to create a rich tomato sauce with a hint of sweetness.
  • Incorporate fresh basil and parmesan cheese for added flavor.

Ingredients

  • 1 brown onion, diced
  • 5 grams basil, chopped
  • 5 cloves garlic, thinly sliced
  • 500 grams penne pasta
  • 1.5 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 tablespoons white wine
  • 600 grams canned tomatoes
  • 3 basil stems
  • Sea salt flakes
  • Cracked black pepper
  • 1.5 teaspoons sugar
  • 3/4 cup thickened cream
  • Parmesan cheese, grated (for serving)
  • Extra virgin olive oil (for serving)

Instructions

  1. Dice one brown onion into small pieces.
  2. Roughly chop 5 grams of basil.
  3. Thinly slice 5 cloves of garlic.
  4. Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a boil over high heat.
  5. Add salt to the boiling water.
  6. Add 500 grams of penne pasta to the boiling water and cook for one minute less than the package instructions.
  7. Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
  8. Add 1.5 tablespoons of olive oil to the pan.
  9. Sauté the diced onion for three minutes.
  10. Add the sliced garlic and sauté for 45 seconds.
  11. Deglaze the pan with 2 tablespoons of white wine and reduce for one minute.
  12. Add 600 grams of canned tomatoes, 3 basil stems, sea salt flakes, cracked black pepper to taste, and 1.5 teaspoons of sugar to the pan.
  13. Mix to combine and bring to a boil.
  14. Add 3/4 cup of thickened cream.
  15. Reduce heat to low and simmer for six minutes.
  16. Remove the basil stems from the sauce.
  17. Add the cooked penne to the sauce.
  18. Add the chopped basil to the sauce and mix to combine.
  19. Cook for one minute.
  20. Check and adjust the seasoning.
  21. Serve in bowls.
  22. Grate parmesan cheese over the pasta.
  23. Add cracked black pepper, chopped basil, and extra virgin olive oil to taste.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wITXIl_kfo8

creamy_sun_dried_tomato_chicken.txt - Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato Chicken

Objectives

  • Learn how to make a rich and flavorful creamy sun-dried tomato chicken dish.
  • Master the technique of searing chicken for optimal flavor and texture.
  • Discover how to create a delicious and creamy sauce with sun-dried tomatoes, white wine, and fresh basil.

Ingredients

  • 1 small brown onion
  • 4 cloves fresh garlic
  • 2 tablespoons (30 ml) sun-dried tomato oil
  • 750 grams (1.6 pounds) boneless chicken thigh
  • 1 teaspoon sea salt flakes
  • 1 teaspoon (10 cracks) black pepper
  • 1/2 cup (125 ml) white wine (or chicken/vegetable stock)
  • 3/4 cup (180 ml) chicken stock
  • 1/2 cup (100 grams) sun-dried tomatoes
  • 1 tablespoon (30 grams) Dijon mustard
  • 1/2 cup (15 grams) freshly grated Parmesan cheese
  • 200 ml thickened cream (whipping cream)
  • 1 cup (15 grams) fresh basil leaves

Instructions

  1. Slice the onion in half, peel off the skin, and dice it thinly, saving the root and excess flesh for stock.
  2. Grate the garlic cloves into a paste using a microplane or finely slice/dice them.
  3. Heat a large heavy-based pot over high heat.
  4. Pour in the sun-dried tomato oil.
  5. Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
  6. Sear the chicken for 4 minutes per side until golden brown and slightly crispy.
  7. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside to rest.
  8. Sauté the diced onions in the pot for 3 minutes until translucent and golden brown.
  9. Add the garlic paste and sauté for 15 seconds, stirring constantly.
  10. Deglaze the pot with white wine (or stock), scraping up any browned bits.
  11. Reduce the wine for 1 minute.
  12. Add chicken stock, sun-dried tomatoes, Dijon mustard, Parmesan cheese, and thickened cream.
  13. Mix well and season with salt and pepper.
  14. Simmer the sauce for 6 minutes, stirring frequently, until thickened.
  15. Return the chicken to the pot and simmer for 2 minutes, ensuring it's coated in the sauce.
  16. Stir in the fresh basil leaves.
  17. Remove the pot from the heat.
  18. Serve the chicken with the sauce, sun-dried tomatoes, basil, and optional grated Parmesan cheese.
  19. Season with cracked black pepper.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LcIlSZeSpP8

creamy_tomato_pasta.txt - Creamy Tomato Pasta

Objectives

  • Prepare a delicious and easy creamy tomato pasta meal prep.
  • Create a flavorful sauce with a depth of flavor.
  • Store the pasta for up to four days in the fridge or five months in the freezer.

Ingredients

  • 2 brown or yellow onions, diced
  • 6 cloves garlic, minced
  • 10 grams basil leaves, chopped
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 100 grams concentrated tomato paste
  • Sea salt flakes
  • Cracked black pepper
  • 150 milliliters chicken stock
  • 2 cans diced or crushed tomatoes
  • 3 grams dried oregano
  • 2 grams dried basil
  • 4 basil stems
  • 500 grams penne pasta
  • 150 grams baby spinach (optional)
  • 60 grams light cream cheese (optional)
  • Parmigiano Reggiano cheese (optional)

Instructions

  1. Dice onions and mince garlic. Roughly chop basil leaves and save stems.
  2. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat.
  3. Heat olive oil in a large, high-rimmed pan over medium-high heat.
  4. Add diced onions and saute for 3 minutes, until translucent and slightly golden.
  5. Add minced garlic and saute for 45 seconds to 1 minute, breaking up any clumps.
  6. Add tomato paste and cook for 3 minutes, mixing regularly to ensure even cooking.
  7. Season with salt flakes and 10 cracks of black pepper.
  8. Cook for 3 minutes, mixing regularly.
  9. Add chicken stock and bring to a boil, mixing regularly.
  10. Cook for 2 minutes to deglaze the pan.
  11. Add diced or crushed tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, and basil stems.
  12. Mix well and bring to a boil.
  13. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 12 minutes.
  14. Add penne pasta to boiling salted water, stirring to prevent sticking.
  15. Cook for 2 minutes less than the packet instructions.
  16. Remove basil stems from the sauce.
  17. Add cooked pasta to the sauce, including some pasta water.
  18. Add baby spinach (optional) and mix well.
  19. Add light cream cheese (optional) and chopped basil.
  20. Season to taste with salt flakes and 20 cracks of black pepper.
  21. Mix well to combine flavors.
  22. Portion the pasta into containers.
  23. Top with Parmigiano Reggiano cheese (optional) and cracked black pepper.
  24. Store in the refrigerator for up to 4 days or in the freezer for up to 5 months.
  25. Reheat in the microwave or on the stovetop.
  26. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-MIgyuXi_g

crispy_beef_stir_fry.txt - Crispy Beef Stir-Fry

Objectives

  • Learn to make a crispy beef stir-fry with beef that stays crispy.
  • Create a flavorful sweet chili sauce.
  • Understand the importance of proper frying techniques for achieving crispy beef.

Ingredients

English | Chinese ------- | -------- 1 brown or yellow onion | 洋葱 1 red bell pepper | 红辣椒 3 spring onions | 春葱 2 cloves garlic | 大蒜 1 long red chili | 红辣椒 300 grams rump, scotch or ribeye beef | 牛肉 20 milliliters low sodium soy sauce | 生抽 3.5 grams bicarb soda | 小苏打 ground white pepper | 白胡椒粉 100 grams corn flour | 玉米淀粉 40 milliliters low sodium soy sauce | 生抽 90 grams sweet chili sauce | 甜辣椒酱 30 grams tomato ketchup | 番茄酱 20 milliliters rice wine vinegar | 米醋 10 milliliters sesame oil | 芝麻油 10 grams sesame seeds | 芝麻 neutral flavored oil | 中性油 1 tablespoon peanut oil | 花生油

Instructions

  1. Slice the onion in half, remove the peel and slice into thin half-moon strips.
  2. Slice the red bell pepper in half, remove the seeds and stem, and slice into thin strips.
  3. Remove the root from the spring onions. Separate the green stems from the white root ends.
  4. Slice the white root ends into 2-inch pieces.
  5. Slice the green stems on a slight angle to create diamond or oval shapes.
  6. Create a garlic paste by grating or microplaning the garlic cloves.
  7. Remove the stem from the chili and slice into thin rounds.
  8. Slice the beef across the grain into thin, even strips.
  9. In a bowl, combine the beef with soy sauce, bicarb soda, and white pepper. Mix well and marinate for 30 minutes.
  10. In a separate bowl, mix together the sweet chili sauce ingredients: soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, tomato ketchup, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, garlic paste, and white pepper. Whisk until combined.
  11. (Optional) Toast sesame seeds in a pan over medium heat until golden brown and fragrant.
  12. Heat a large wok or pot over high heat and fill halfway with neutral flavored oil. Heat the oil to 190°C/375°F.
  13. Coat the marinated beef in corn flour, ensuring it is completely covered.
  14. Fry the beef in batches in the hot oil for 2-2.5 minutes, until golden brown and crispy. Remove with a kitchen spider and drain on a plate lined with kitchen towels.
  15. Allow the oil to reheat for 1 minute between batches.
  16. Heat a large pan over high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of peanut oil and fry the onion and bell pepper for 3 minutes, until golden and the onion is translucent.
  17. Add the spring onion stems and fry for 1 minute.
  18. Add the sweet chili sauce to the pan, scraping the bowl to ensure all the sauce is included.
  19. Add the crispy beef and toss everything together until well coated. Reduce the heat to medium and continue cooking until the sauce reduces and sticks to the ingredients.
  20. Serve the crispy beef stir-fry over rice or on its own. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds, chili, and spring onion stems (optional).

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RRqb-elQpk

crispy_buffalo_chicken_burgers.txt - Crispy Buffalo Chicken Burgers

Objectives

  • Learn how to make a delicious buffalo sauce and herbie mayonnaise.
  • Make crispy buffalo chicken burgers with a simple marinade and flour mix.
  • Assemble the burgers with various toppings and enjoy.

Ingredients

Marinade: - 1 cup (250 ml) buttermilk - 2 tablespoons (40 ml) Frank's hot sauce - 4 large boneless, skinless chicken thighs

Flour Mix: - 1 1/2 cups (225 g) all-purpose flour - 3 tablespoons (35 g) corn flour - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) garlic powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) celery salt

Herbie Mayonnaise: - 1 large egg - 2 1/2 teaspoons (15 ml) white vinegar - 1 teaspoon (10 g) Dijon mustard - 200 ml (200 g) oil of choice (not EVOO, sesame, or motor oil) - 10 g (0.3 oz) flat-leaf parsley, chopped - 15 g (0.5 oz) dill, chopped

Buffalo Sauce: - 1 cup (250 ml) Frank's hot sauce - 2 cloves garlic, minced - 1 teaspoon (5 ml) white vinegar - 1 teaspoon (5 ml) Worcestershire sauce - 110 g (3.8 oz) cubed unsalted butter

Burger Assembly: - 1 tomato, thinly sliced - 1 dill pickle, thinly sliced - Lettuce (optional) - Sea salt flakes (optional) - Cheese (optional) - Brioche burger buns (optional) - Frying oil of choice

Instructions

  1. Prepare the marinade: Combine buttermilk and Frank's hot sauce in a bowl. Add chicken thighs and marinate for 30 minutes to 48 hours in the refrigerator.
  2. Make the flour mix: Combine all-purpose flour, corn flour, garlic powder, paprika, and celery salt in a large bowl. Whisk until well combined.
  3. Make the herbie mayonnaise: Combine egg, white vinegar, Dijon mustard, and oil in a tall jar or container. Blend with an immersion blender until emulsified. Add chopped parsley and dill, blend again, and adjust seasoning to taste. Refrigerate for up to one week.
  4. Make the buffalo sauce: Combine Frank's hot sauce, minced garlic, white vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cubed butter and whisk until melted. Cook for 2 minutes until smooth. Remove from heat.
  5. Fry the chicken: Heat frying oil in a large pan over medium-high heat to 170°C (340°F). Remove chicken from marinade and dredge in flour mix, coating thoroughly. Fry chicken in batches for 3 minutes per side, or until golden brown and crispy. Drain on a wire rack.
  6. Toss chicken in buffalo sauce: Place fried chicken in a bowl and toss with buffalo sauce. Alternatively, dip chicken in sauce.
  7. Prepare the buns: Toast burger buns if desired. Spread herbie mayonnaise on both top and bottom buns.
  8. Assemble the burgers: Layer lettuce, tomato, sea salt flakes, crispy buffalo chicken, cheese (optional), dill pickles (optional), and more buffalo sauce (optional) on the bottom bun. Top with the other bun. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFgDoXm0yL4

crispy_chicken_burger.txt - Crispy Chicken Burger

Objectives

  • Learn to make a juicy and crispy chicken burger.
  • Prepare a flavorful buttermilk marinade for the chicken.
  • Create a seasoned flour mixture for a crispy coating.

Ingredients

Chicken Marinade - 1 cup buttermilk - 1 tablespoon sriracha sauce - 1 teaspoon smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon onion powder - 1 teaspoon garlic powder

Chicken Coating - 1 1/2 cups plain flour - 3 tablespoons corn flour - 1 teaspoon smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon onion powder - 1 teaspoon garlic powder - 1 teaspoon celery salt

Burger Assembly - 4 large chicken thighs - Burger buns (quantity not specified) - Crispy lettuce (quantity not specified) - 3 slices fresh tomato - Sea salt flakes - Cracked black pepper - Pickles (optional) - Special mayo (recipe in a separate video)

Instructions

  1. In a bowl, combine buttermilk, sriracha sauce, smoked paprika, onion powder, and garlic powder.
  2. Whisk the ingredients until well combined.
  3. Add four large chicken thighs to the marinade and mix to coat thoroughly.
  4. Wrap the chicken tightly and marinate in the refrigerator for one hour.
  5. In a separate bowl, combine plain flour, corn flour, smoked paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and celery salt.
  6. Use a dry whisk to mix the ingredients until well combined.
  7. Remove the marinated chicken from the refrigerator and coat it thoroughly in the flour mixture.
  8. Ensure all parts of the chicken are coated and no wet areas remain.
  9. Heat oil to 170 degrees Celsius.
  10. Gently fry the coated chicken for three minutes on each side, until golden and crispy.
  11. Remove the chicken from the oil and drain excess oil.
  12. Toast and coat the burger buns with the special mayo (recipe in a separate video).
  13. Place crispy lettuce and three slices of fresh tomato on the bottom bun.
  14. Season with sea salt flakes and cracked black pepper.
  15. Add the crispy chicken to the bun.
  16. Optionally, add pickles.
  17. Place the top bun on the burger.
  18. Enjoy your incredibly delicious crispy chicken burger!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K3tpV4xJttQ

crispy_chicken_tenderloins.txt - Crispy Chicken Tenderloins with Honey Mustard Mayonnaise

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy chicken tenderloins with a honey mustard mayonnaise.
  • Explore both frying and baking methods for the chicken.
  • Discover a simple and effective way to create a flavorful egg wash.
  • Master the art of making a delicious honey mustard mayonnaise.

Ingredients

For the Chicken: - 1 large lemon, juiced (save half for later) - 1 large clove of garlic, minced - 1 large free-range egg - 1 tablespoon (20 ml) olive oil - 750 grams (1.6 pounds) chicken tenderloins - Sea salt flakes - Cracked black pepper

For the Breadcrumbs: - 110 grams (3.8 ounces) panko bread crumbs - 90 grams (3.1 ounces) fine bread crumbs - 1 teaspoon (2.5 grams) onion powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 grams) garlic powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 grams) smoked paprika

For the Honey Mustard Mayonnaise: - 200 ml (200 grams) olive oil - 1 large free-range egg, shell-free - Remaining lemon juice (half a lemon) - 1 teaspoon (10 grams) Dijon mustard - Sea salt flakes - 60 grams (2.1 ounces) runny honey - 60 grams (2.1 ounces) Dijon mustard - 1/4 teaspoon (0.2 grams) cayenne pepper

For Frying: - Canola or sunflower oil (enough to fill pan halfway)

For Baking: - Parchment paper

Instructions

  1. Juice a large lemon and divide the juice in half.
  2. Mince a large clove of garlic.
  3. In a large bowl, whisk together one egg, minced garlic, half of the lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil. This is your egg wash.
  4. Add 750 grams of chicken tenderloins to the egg wash and season with salt and pepper.
  5. Massage the chicken tenderloins until well coated in the egg wash. Set aside.
  6. In another bowl, combine panko breadcrumbs, fine breadcrumbs, onion powder, garlic powder, and smoked paprika.
  7. In a jar or tall container, combine olive oil, one egg, remaining lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and salt.
  8. Using an immersion blender, blend the ingredients until a thick mayonnaise forms.
  9. Transfer the mayonnaise to a clean bowl.
  10. Add honey, Dijon mustard, and cayenne pepper to the mayonnaise and whisk until smooth. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
  11. Coat the chicken tenderloins in the breadcrumb mixture, working in batches to avoid sogginess.
  12. Place the breaded chicken tenderloins on a large plate.
  13. For baked chicken, place the tenderloins on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
  14. Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Fahrenheit).
  15. Bake the chicken for 12 minutes, flipping halfway through.
  16. For fried chicken, heat a large pan or pot with oil over high heat until shimmering (170 degrees Celsius/340 degrees Fahrenheit).
  17. Carefully add the chicken tenderloins to the hot oil, frying for 2.5 minutes per side or until golden brown.
  18. Remove the chicken from the oil and place on a wire rack or paper towels to drain.
  19. Allow the oil to cool overnight, then strain it through a sieve and return it to the bottle for reuse.
  20. Once baked or fried, sprinkle the chicken with sea salt flakes or chicken salt.
  21. Serve the chicken with the honey mustard mayonnaise.
  22. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mUX-61BhhkY

crispy_chicken_wings.txt - Crispy Chicken Wings with Caramel Sauce

Objectives

  • Make a crispy chicken wing recipe with a delicious caramel sauce
  • Learn to marinate chicken wings for maximum flavor
  • Understand the importance of double frying for extra crispy wings

Ingredients

Chicken - 1.2 kilos (2.6 pounds) chicken wings (drummettes and wingettes) - 2 teaspoons (4 grams) onion powder - 2 teaspoons (4 grams) garlic powder - 1 tablespoon (20 milliliters) fish sauce - 1 teaspoon (5 grams) sea salt flakes - 1 teaspoon (10 cracks) black pepper

Sauce - 3 small shallots (or 2 large) - 2 large long red chilies - 7 cloves of garlic - 2 whole spring onions - 2 large limes - 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) peanut oil, canola oil, or vegetable oil - 3.5 tablespoons (56 grams) brown sugar - 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) fish sauce

Coating - 1 cup (140 grams) corn flour or starch - 1 teaspoon (5 grams) baking powder

Other - Vegetable oil, canola oil, or sunflower oil (for frying) - 10 fresh mint leaves - Small handful of coriander or cilantro (optional)

Instructions

  1. Remove tips from chicken wings and combine with onion powder, garlic powder, fish sauce, salt, and pepper.
  2. Marinate wings for at least 30 minutes, up to 24 hours.
  3. Dice shallots, red chilies, garlic, and spring onions.
  4. Juice limes.
  5. Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat.
  6. Add shallots and cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
  7. Add garlic, chilies, brown sugar, and fish sauce to the pan.
  8. Stir to combine and bring to a boil.
  9. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  10. Remove from heat and stir in spring onions and lime juice.
  11. Heat oil in a large pan or pot to 180°C (350°F).
  12. Mix corn flour and baking powder in a bowl.
  13. Coat marinated wings in the flour mixture, one at a time.
  14. Fry wings in batches for 3-4 minutes, or until lightly golden.
  15. Drain wings on a wire rack.
  16. Allow oil to reheat, then fry wings again for 2-3 minutes, or until golden brown.
  17. Drain wings again and allow to cool.
  18. Place wings in a bowl and pour over the caramel sauce.
  19. Toss to coat wings in sauce.
  20. Add mint leaves and coriander (optional).
  21. Serve wings garnished with sliced spring onions, mint, and coriander.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LfADt3Z-E7Y

crispy_chicken_wraps.txt - Crispy Chicken Wraps with 11 Herbs and Spices & Pepper Mayo

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy chicken wraps with 11 herbs and spices and pepper mayo.
  • Prepare the ingredients for the wraps, including the chicken marinade and the pepper mayo sauce.
  • Assemble the wraps with lettuce, tomato, and crispy chicken.

Ingredients

  • 2-3 tomatoes (small to medium size)
  • Lettuce
  • Chicken, sliced into thin strips
  • 11 herbs and spices (list provided in video description)
  • Buttermilk
  • Flour
  • Mayonnaise
  • Ground black pepper
  • Seasoning
  • Flour tortillas

Instructions

  1. Chop tomatoes into small to medium sized pieces.
  2. Shred lettuce and wash it.
  3. Slice chicken into thin strips.
  4. Combine 11 herbs and spices in a mixing bowl.
  5. In a separate bowl, combine chicken, buttermilk, and 3 tablespoons of the spice mix.
  6. Marinate the chicken for 30 minutes to 24 hours.
  7. Combine remaining spice mix with flour and set aside.
  8. Mix mayonnaise with ground black pepper, cracked black pepper, and seasoning to taste.
  9. Dust chicken in flour and fry for 5-6 minutes until golden.
  10. Remove chicken from pan and drain.
  11. Spread pepper mayo on a flour tortilla.
  12. Add lettuce, diced tomatoes, and chicken to the tortilla.
  13. Wrap the tortilla and enjoy your crispy chicken wraps.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6te1Zy_lu4

crispy_chili_beef_stir_fry.txt - Crispy Chili Beef Stir Fry

Objectives

  • Learn how to make a delicious and easy crispy chili beef stir fry.
  • Master the technique of stir-frying vegetables and beef for optimal texture and flavor.
  • Understand the importance of using the right ingredients and proportions for a balanced dish.

Ingredients

  • 1 onion
  • 1 bell pepper (capsicum)
  • 1 bunch spring onions
  • 1 long red chili
  • 2 cloves garlic
  • Beef (amount not specified)
  • Soy sauce (amount not specified)
  • Bicarbonate of soda (amount not specified)
  • Ground white pepper (amount not specified)
  • Sweet chili sauce (amount not specified)
  • Tomato ketchup (amount not specified)
  • Rice wine vinegar (amount not specified)
  • Sesame oil (amount not specified)
  • Corn flour (amount not specified)
  • Oil (for frying)
  • Toasted sesame seeds (for garnish)

Instructions

  1. Remove the top and bottom of the onion. Slice it in half and then thinly slice.
  2. Slice the bell pepper in half, remove the pith and seeds, then thinly slice into strips.
  3. Separate the roots and stems from the spring onions, chop roughly, and thinly slice the stem ends for garnish.
  4. Thinly slice one long red chili.
  5. Grate the garlic on a microplane.
  6. Thinly slice the beef into strips.
  7. In a bowl, combine the sliced beef with soy sauce, bicarbonate of soda, and ground white pepper. Mix well and set aside.
  8. In another bowl, combine soy sauce, sweet chili sauce, tomato ketchup, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ground white pepper. Whisk until well combined and set aside.
  9. Heat oil in a wok to 180 degrees Celsius.
  10. Dust the beef with corn flour.
  11. Add the beef to the hot oil and fry for 2.5 minutes, or until crispy.
  12. Remove the beef from the wok and drain on a pan lined with paper towels.
  13. Over high heat, add oil to the wok.
  14. Add the sliced onion, bell pepper, and chopped spring onion stems. Mix and cook for 3 minutes.
  15. Add the remaining sliced spring onion and cook for 1 minute.
  16. Pour in the prepared sauce and add the cooked beef. Mix well and cook for 1 minute, until the sauce thickens and coats the ingredients.
  17. Serve over rice and garnish with toasted sesame seeds, sliced chili, and sliced spring onion.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SD1bCnZNrII

crispy_fried_chicken_burgers.txt - Crispy Fried Chicken Burgers

Objectives

  • Make crispy fried chicken burgers with a tangy mayonnaise.
  • Learn to marinate chicken for maximum tenderness and flavor.
  • Create a tangy mayonnaise sauce perfect for burgers.

Ingredients

Chicken Marinade - 1 cup (250 ml) buttermilk - 1 tablespoon (20 ml) sriracha sauce (optional) - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) onion powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) garlic powder

Flour Mix - 1 1/2 cups (225 g) all-purpose flour - 3 tablespoons (35 g) corn flour or starch - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) onion powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) garlic powder - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) celery salt

Tangy Mayonnaise - 200 ml (200 g) olive oil - 1 large egg - 1 1/2 teaspoons (15 ml) white vinegar - 1 teaspoon (10 g) Dijon mustard - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 g) garlic powder - 1 tablespoon (20 g) tomato ketchup - 1 tablespoon (20 g) horseradish - 1 tablespoon (20 ml) Worcestershire sauce - Sea salt flakes to taste

Burger Fillings - Sliced tomato - Washed baby lettuce leaves - Pickled cucumbers (optional)

Instructions

  1. Prepare the Chicken Marinade: Combine buttermilk, sriracha sauce (optional), smoked paprika, onion powder, and garlic powder in a bowl. Whisk until smooth and light reddish.
  2. Marinate the Chicken: Add 4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs to the marinade. Massage the chicken thoroughly to ensure even coating. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, up to 48 hours.
  3. Make the Flour Mix: Combine all-purpose flour, corn flour, smoked paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, and celery salt in a bowl. Whisk until evenly distributed.
  4. Prepare the Tangy Mayonnaise: Combine olive oil, egg, white vinegar, and Dijon mustard in a tall jar. Blend with an immersion blender on low speed until smooth and thick.
  5. Enhance the Mayonnaise: Transfer the plain mayonnaise to a clean bowl. Add smoked paprika, garlic powder, tomato ketchup, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, and sea salt flakes. Whisk until smooth and combined. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
  6. Dredge the Chicken: Remove the marinated chicken from the refrigerator. Dredge each thigh in the flour mix, ensuring complete coverage. Shake off any excess flour and set aside.
  7. Heat the Oil: Heat a large pot of vegetable, canola, or sunflower oil over high heat to 170°C (340°F). Alternatively, use a deep fryer.
  8. Fry the Chicken: Carefully place the dredged chicken thighs in the hot oil, working in batches if necessary. Fry for 7 minutes, flipping halfway through, until golden brown and crispy.
  9. Toast the Buns: While the chicken is frying, place burger buns on an oven tray facing up. Toast in a preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) on the grill or broiler setting for 1 minute per side.
  10. Drain the Chicken: Remove the fried chicken from the oil and place on a wire rack over a tray or kitchen cloth to drain excess oil.
  11. Assemble the Burgers: Spread a generous amount of tangy mayonnaise on the top and bottom buns. Layer sliced tomato, seasoned with salt and pepper, on the bottom bun. Top with the fried chicken thigh. Add pickled cucumbers (optional). Close with the top bun.
  12. Serve: Enjoy your crispy, juicy, and flavorful chicken burgers! Serve with chips, fries, or extra tangy mayonnaise.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L5Z3mO5SqJs

crispy_fried_prawns.txt - Crispy Fried Prawns with Fennel Salt and Lemon Aioli

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy fried prawns with a fennel salt and lemon aioli.
  • Prepare a delicious lemon aioli from scratch.
  • Create a flavorful fennel salt to season the prawns.

Ingredients

  • 1 free range egg yolk
  • 1 garlic clove, minced
  • 1 teaspoon (7 grams) Dijon mustard
  • 1/4 cup (60 milliliters) extra virgin olive oil
  • 1 large lemon, juiced to taste
  • Salt flakes, to taste
  • 10 grams (0.3 ounces) whole fennel seeds
  • 15 grams (0.5 ounces) sea salt flakes
  • 750 grams (1.6 pounds) prawns, peeled and deveined
  • 200 grams (7.05 ounces) plain flour
  • 1 teaspoon (4.5 grams) baking powder (optional)
  • Sunflower oil, canola oil, or vegetable oil (enough to fill a pan 1/4 full)

Instructions

  1. Make the Lemon Aioli:
  2. Secure a bowl in place with a towel.
  3. Add the egg yolk, minced garlic, and Dijon mustard to the bowl.
  4. Whisk the ingredients together until combined.
  5. Slowly pour in the olive oil while continuously whisking vigorously to create an emulsion.
  6. Juice the lemon and add to the aioli to taste.
  7. Season with salt flakes and mix well.
  8. Refrigerate the aioli until ready to serve.
  9. Make the Fennel Salt:
  10. Heat a pan over high heat.
  11. Add the fennel seeds and toast for 2 minutes, stirring frequently.
  12. Grind the toasted fennel seeds into a fine powder using a spice grinder or mortar and pestle.
  13. Combine the ground fennel powder with the sea salt flakes in a bowl and mix well.
  14. Store the fennel salt in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.
  15. Prepare the Prawns:
  16. Remove the heads from the prawns by twisting gently.
  17. Peel the prawns, leaving the tails on if desired.
  18. Devein the prawns using a skewer to gently remove the vein.
  19. Coat the Prawns:
  20. Combine the flour and baking powder (optional) in a mixing bowl.
  21. Add the prawns to the flour mixture in batches, ensuring each prawn is evenly coated.
  22. Transfer the coated prawns to a plate.
  23. Fry the Prawns:
  24. Heat the oil in a large, high-rimmed pan or pot over high heat to 180°C (350°F).
  25. Carefully add the prawns to the hot oil in batches, ensuring the oil doesn't splash back.
  26. Fry for 2 minutes, or until golden brown.
  27. Stir the prawns halfway through to ensure even cooking and crispness.
  28. Remove the prawns from the oil using a kitchen spider or slotted spoon, shaking off excess oil.
  29. Place the prawns on a wire rack over a baking tray to drain, or on a kitchen cloth over a plate.
  30. Season and Serve:
  31. Season the fried prawns generously with the fennel salt.
  32. Serve the prawns on a serving board or bowl.
  33. Accompany with the lemon aioli and a lemon wedge.
  34. Squeeze the lemon wedge over the prawns for a fresh citrus flavor.
  35. Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3xBwVEbQA80

crispy_garlic_chili_oil.txt - Crispy Garlic Chili Oil

Objectives

  • Learn to make a quick and easy crispy garlic chili oil
  • Master the technique for roasting peanuts
  • Create a flavorful and aromatic chili oil for dipping and cooking

Ingredients

  • 40 grams of peanuts
  • 3 spring onion root ends
  • 8 cloves of garlic
  • 2 tablespoons of dried chilies
  • 150 milliliters of peanut oil
  • 150 milliliters of sesame oil
  • 2 tablespoons of brown sugar

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 180°C (355°F).
  2. Roughly chop 40 grams of peanuts.
  3. Spread the chopped peanuts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
  4. Roast the peanuts for 2-3 minutes, then allow to cool.
  5. Thinly slice 3 spring onion root ends into rounds.
  6. Thinly slice or mince 8 cloves of garlic.
  7. Heat 2 tablespoons of dried chilies and 150 milliliters of peanut oil in a pan over medium-low heat.
  8. Add the sliced spring onion and garlic to the pan and mix to combine.
  9. Gently cook for 13 minutes, stirring occasionally.
  10. Add 150 milliliters of sesame oil, 2 tablespoons of brown sugar, and the toasted peanuts to the pan.
  11. Mix well and cook for 2 minutes to melt the sugar.
  12. Transfer the chili oil mixture to a clean jar, pouring the oil first, followed by the solids.
  13. Secure the lid tightly.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2l7-NLwA4Y

crispy_garlic_parmesan_fries.txt - Crispy Garlic Parmesan Fries

Objectives

  • Learn how to make crispy garlic parmesan fries.
  • Understand the importance of soaking potatoes in cold water.
  • Discover how to create a flavorful garlic butter sauce.

Ingredients

  • Potatoes
  • Cold water
  • Garlic
  • Flat leaf parsley (optional)
  • Butter
  • Cornflour or starch
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Parmesan cheese (optional)
  • Dipping sauce (optional)

Instructions

  1. Slice potatoes into even-sized batons.
  2. Soak the potato batons in cold water for about an hour.
  3. Boil the potatoes for 5 minutes until soft but still firm.
  4. Grate garlic using a microplane to create a paste.
  5. Roughly chop flat leaf parsley if using.
  6. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat until foamy.
  7. Add garlic paste and parsley to the melted butter and cook for 1 minute.
  8. Drain and dry the potatoes thoroughly.
  9. Toss potatoes with cornflour or starch.
  10. Fry potatoes at 160°C for 5-6 minutes until golden.
  11. Increase oil temperature to 180°C.
  12. Fry potatoes in batches for 4 minutes until golden and crispy.
  13. Remove and drain potatoes.
  14. Season potatoes with salt and pepper.
  15. Drizzle with garlic butter and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese (optional).
  16. Toss to combine.
  17. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1RfkWJbNbak

crispy_honey_glazed_chicken_tenders.txt - Crispy Honey Glazed Chicken Tenders

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy, juicy chicken tenders with a honey glaze.
  • Prepare a refreshing coleslaw to accompany the chicken.
  • Understand the importance of marinating the chicken for optimal flavor.

Ingredients

For the Marinade: - 4 large eggs - 320 milliliters (1 1/4 cups) buttermilk - 148 milliliters (1/2 cup) Frank's Hot Sauce - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) onion powder - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) garlic powder - 1 tablespoon (10 grams) smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 grams) red chili powder (optional) - Pinch of sea salt flakes - 20 cracks of black pepper - 800 grams (1.76 pounds) chicken tenderloins

For the Coleslaw: - 150 grams (5.2 ounces) white cabbage, thinly sliced - 150 grams (5.2 ounces) red cabbage, thinly sliced - 7 grams (0.25 ounces) curly or flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped - 2 spring onions (scallions), thinly sliced - 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced - 30 grams (1.06 ounces) macadamia nuts, roughly chopped - 110 grams (3.8 ounces) plain Greek yogurt - 2 tablespoons (40 milliliters) macadamia oil (or extra virgin olive oil) - 12 grams (0.4 ounces) honey - Sea salt flakes to taste - Cracked black pepper to taste - 1/2 lemon, juiced

For the Dredging Mix: - 2.5 cups (320 grams) plain all-purpose flour - 3/4 cup (100 grams) corn flour or starch - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) onion powder - 2 teaspoons (5 grams) garlic powder - 1 tablespoon (10 grams) smoked paprika - 1 teaspoon (2.5 grams) red chili powder (optional) - 1 teaspoon (3 grams) celery salt - Cracked black pepper to taste

For the Honey Hot Sauce Glaze: - 1/3 cup (80 milliliters) Frank's Hot Sauce - 100 grams (3.5 ounces) honey - 1 tablespoon (14 grams) unsalted butter

Other: - Cooking oil (for frying) - Salt and pepper (for seasoning) - Parsley (for garnish)

Instructions

  1. Prepare the marinade: In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, buttermilk, Frank's Hot Sauce, onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, red chili powder (optional), salt flakes, and black pepper until smooth. Add the chicken tenderloins and massage them in the marinade until well coated. Cover and marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 24 hours.
  2. Prepare the coleslaw: Remove the core from the cabbages and thinly slice them. Roughly chop the parsley. Thinly slice the spring onions and red onion. Roughly chop the macadamia nuts.
  3. Assemble the coleslaw: In a large bowl, combine the sliced cabbages, chopped parsley, sliced spring onions, sliced red onion, and macadamia nuts. Add the Greek yogurt, macadamia oil, honey, salt flakes, and black pepper. Mix well until combined. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Add the lemon juice and mix again. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
  4. Prepare the dredging mix: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, corn flour, onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, red chili powder (optional), celery salt, and black pepper.
  5. Dredge the chicken: Drain the marinated chicken tenderloins and transfer them to the flour mix. Coat them well, ensuring all sides are covered. Dust off any excess flour. Return the chicken to the marinade and coat them thoroughly again, making sure to reach any dry spots. Finally, place the chicken back in the flour mix for a double coating. Dust off any excess flour and place the chicken on a baking tray lined with a wire rack. Repeat with the remaining chicken.
  6. Make the honey hot sauce glaze: In a small saucepan over medium-high heat, combine the Frank's Hot Sauce, honey, and butter. Stir until the butter melts and the glaze is smooth and glossy. Set aside.
  7. Cook the chicken: Heat a large, high-rimmed pan or pot over medium-high heat. Pour in enough cooking oil to fill the pan about halfway and heat to 190°C (375°F). Carefully add the chicken to the hot oil in batches, making sure to do so away from you to avoid splattering. Fry for 2-2.5 minutes per side, or until golden brown and crispy. Remove the chicken from the oil and drain on paper towels. Season with salt and pepper if desired.
  8. Glaze the chicken: Drizzle the honey hot sauce glaze over the cooked chicken tenders.
  9. Serve: Arrange the crispy chicken tenders on a plate or serving board. Serve with the refreshing coleslaw and any remaining honey hot sauce glaze. Garnish with fresh parsley for a pop of color.

Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TKGML5grZ-g

crispy_potato_skins.txt - Crispy Potato Skins

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy potato skins with a delicious bacon and cheese filling.
  • Understand the importance of properly boiling and baking potatoes for optimal texture.
  • Master the art of creating a flavorful filling with bacon, potato, and seasonings.

Ingredients

  • 1 kilo (2.2 pounds) Yukon gold potatoes or all-rounder potatoes
  • 180 grams (6.3 ounces) streaky bacon
  • 2 spring onions (optional)
  • 1 tablespoon (20 milliliters) olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon (5 grams) sea salt flakes
  • Black pepper
  • Freshly grated mozzarella cheese
  • Sour cream

Instructions

  1. Wash potatoes and place in a large saucepan or pot.
  2. Fill with cold water 2 inches above the potatoes.
  3. Add a sprinkle of sea salt flakes to the water.
  4. Bring to a boil over high heat.
  5. Boil for 16-18 minutes or until the potato surfaces are slightly soft.
  6. While potatoes are boiling, dice the bacon into small pieces.
  7. Thinly slice the spring onion tops on a slight angle (optional).
  8. Once potatoes are cooked, drain them and allow them to cool for 30 minutes or place in the fridge for 20 minutes.
  9. Slice each potato in half lengthwise.
  10. Gently scoop out the center of each potato half, leaving a 1-centimeter rim around the edge.
  11. Place the scooped-out potato pieces in a bowl for later use.
  12. Prepare a large baking tray with parchment paper.
  13. Arrange the potato halves on the tray, ensuring they are not overlapping.
  14. Drizzle 1 tablespoon of olive oil over the potato halves.
  15. Sprinkle 1 teaspoon of sea salt flakes and pepper over each potato half.
  16. Bake in a preheated oven at 190 degrees Celsius (370 degrees Fahrenheit) for 18-20 minutes or until lightly golden brown.
  17. While the potatoes are baking, heat a large skillet over high heat.
  18. Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to the skillet.
  19. Fry the diced bacon for 2-3 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
  20. Add the scooped-out potato pieces to the skillet and break them up well.
  21. Season with 1 teaspoon of sea salt flakes and 1 teaspoon of black pepper.
  22. Reduce heat to medium and fry for 3-4 minutes or until the potato is slightly golden brown.
  23. Turn off the heat and move the skillet to a cold burner for a minute.
  24. Remove the baked potato halves from the oven and place them on a heat-resistant surface or wire rack.
  25. Fill the potato halves generously with the bacon and potato mixture.
  26. Top each potato half with freshly grated mozzarella cheese.
  27. Place the stuffed potato halves back in the oven on the grill or broiler setting.
  28. Grill or broil for 7-9 minutes or until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
  29. Remove the potato skins from the oven and place them on a heat-resistant surface or wire rack.
  30. Add a small amount of sour cream to each potato skin.
  31. Garnish with the sliced spring onion tops (optional).
  32. Serve immediately and enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Wb0gxHgIII

crispy_roast_potatoes.txt - Crispy Roast Potatoes

Objectives

  • Learn to make perfect crispy roast potatoes.
  • Understand the importance of using high starch potatoes and duck fat.
  • Discover how to achieve a crispy shell on the potatoes.

Ingredients

  • 1.2 kilos (2.6 pounds) high starch potatoes
  • 120 grams (4.2 ounces) duck fat
  • Salt to taste

Instructions

  1. Peel 1.2 kilos (2.6 pounds) of high starch potatoes.
  2. Slice the potatoes in half, then in half again, and finally into quarters.
  3. Fill a pot with cold water, ensuring the water level is one inch above the potatoes.
  4. Place the pot over high heat and bring the water to a boil.
  5. Cook the potatoes for 9 minutes or until very soft.
  6. Pour 120 grams (4.2 ounces) of duck fat into a baking pan and spread it evenly.
  7. Preheat the oven to 190°C (375°F) and heat the duck fat in the oven for 20 minutes.
  8. Carefully drain the potatoes through a colander, place a lid on top, and gently shake them to roughen up the surface.
  9. Gently place the potatoes into the hot duck fat, spreading them out evenly. Do not pour them all in at once, as this is dangerous.
  10. Place the baking pan in the oven and roast for one hour, mixing the potatoes every 15 minutes.
  11. Remove the potatoes from the oven and pour them into a mixing bowl, including any crispy bits from the pan.
  12. Season the potatoes to taste.
  13. Give the potatoes a quick mix to ensure they are seasoned evenly.
  14. Pour the potatoes into a serving bowl and enjoy.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xqKQ5G5rcY

crispy_skin_chicken_supreme.txt - Crispy Skin Chicken Supreme with Creamy Mash & Greens

Objectives

  • Learn to break down a whole chicken into Supreme pieces.
  • Make a flavorful chicken broth from the carcass.
  • Prepare a silky smooth creamy potato mash.
  • Sear chicken for crispy skin and bake to perfection.
  • Sauté silverbeet with garlic for a delicious side dish.
  • Assemble the dish with a beautiful presentation.

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 whole chicken - Salt - Black pepper

Broth - 1.5 tbsp olive oil - 2 brown or yellow onions, chopped - 1 bulb garlic, sliced in half - 3 sprigs rosemary - 6 sprigs thyme - 5 black peppercorns - 1 tbsp red wine vinegar - 1/4 cup dry white wine (or chicken stock) - 2 cups chicken stock

Mash - 5 potatoes - Rock salt - 200g (7oz) unsalted butter, softened - 2 tbsp full cream milk

Greens - 1 bunch Swiss chard or silverbeet - 2 cloves garlic, grated - 1/4 cup water or stock - 1 tbsp olive oil

Other - 1 tbsp olive oil (for searing chicken) - 1 tbsp butter (for chicken) - 2 sprigs thyme (for chicken) - 1 sprig rosemary (for chicken) - 2 cloves garlic, crushed (for chicken)

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
  2. Roast Potatoes:
  3. Line a tray with rock salt.
  4. Place 5 potatoes on the tray and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
  5. Break Down Chicken:
  6. Chicken Supreme:
    • Slice between the joint of the flat and drum, pop it back to reveal the drum bone.
    • Slice between the drum and flat to separate.
    • Slice along the line of fat on the thigh and leg to open it up.
    • Peel back the skin to see where to cut.
    • Slice through the pocket of skin to expose the oyster.
    • Pop the bone to separate the oyster.
    • Continue slicing along the joint to detach the thigh and leg.
    • Repeat on the other side.
  7. Breasts:
    • Slice as close as possible to the keel bone on either side of the breast.
    • Follow the carcass down to open it up.
    • Slice in towards the carcass and back out to remove the drum bone.
  8. Carcass:
    • Chop the carcass into small even pieces using a cleaver.
  9. Prepare Broth Ingredients:
  10. Chop 2 onions into consistent pieces, saving all scraps.
  11. Slice 1 bulb of garlic in half.
  12. Make Chicken Broth:
  13. Place a large pot over high heat.
  14. Add 1.5 tbsp olive oil and chicken scraps.
  15. Season with salt and cook for 5-6 minutes until browned.
  16. Add onions, garlic, rosemary, thyme, peppercorns, red wine vinegar, white wine, and chicken stock.
  17. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 35 minutes.
  18. Skim off any impurities that float to the top.
  19. Prepare Silverbeet:
  20. Remove the stem from the silverbeet and slice the leaves into quarters.
  21. Grate 2 cloves garlic on a microplane to create a paste.
  22. Mash Potatoes:
  23. Once the potatoes are cooked, allow them to cool slightly.
  24. Slice the potatoes in half.
  25. Mash them with the skin on (or remove the skin).
  26. Transfer the mashed potatoes to a bowl.
  27. Add 200g softened unsalted butter and 2 tbsp full cream milk.
  28. Mix until the butter melts and the milk loosens the mash.
  29. Optionally, push the mash through a fine mesh sieve to remove any lumps.
  30. Season with salt to taste.
  31. Sauté Silverbeet:
  32. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a wok or pan over medium-high heat.
  33. Add the garlic paste and silverbeet.
  34. Sauté for 2-3 minutes until softened, stirring constantly.
  35. Add 1/4 cup water or stock.
  36. Continue stir-frying for a few more minutes until wilted and cooked through.
  37. Sear and Bake Chicken:
  38. Pat the chicken Supremes dry with paper towels.
  39. Season the skin side with salt.
  40. Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a pan over high heat.
  41. Sear the chicken skin-side down for 3-4 minutes until golden brown.
  42. Season the bottom of the chicken with salt and pepper.
  43. Transfer the chicken to the oven and bake for 14 minutes.
  44. Finish Chicken:
  45. Remove the chicken from the oven and place it back in the pan over medium heat.
  46. Add 1 tbsp butter, thyme, rosemary, and crushed garlic.
  47. Baste the chicken for 1-2 minutes until it reaches an internal temperature of 74°C (165°F).
  48. Reduce Broth:
  49. Strain the chicken broth through a fine mesh sieve into a saucepan.
  50. Reduce the broth over medium-high heat to a simmer, then reduce heat to low and continue simmering.
  51. Assemble Dish:
  52. Spread the creamy mashed potatoes on a high-rimmed plate.
  53. Top with the sautéed silverbeet.
  54. Place the seared chicken on top.
  55. Pour the reduced chicken broth around the edges of the plate, creating a pool.
  56. Serve immediately.

Enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQGRnIiHPUc

crispy_smashed_potatoes.txt - Crispy Smashed Potatoes

Objectives

  • Learn how to make crispy smashed potatoes.
  • Create a delicious honey mustard mayo to accompany the potatoes.
  • Season the potatoes with a flavorful blend of spices.

Ingredients

  • Potatoes
  • Cold salted water
  • Whole egg white
  • Vinegar
  • Dijon mustard
  • Vegetable oil
  • Honey Dijon mustard
  • Whole grain mustard
  • Garlic powder
  • Sweet paprika
  • Salt
  • Pepper
  • Onion powder
  • Garlic powder
  • Smoked paprika
  • Mustard powder
  • Ground fennel
  • Sea salt flakes
  • Flat leaf parsley

Instructions

  1. Add potatoes to a pot of cold salted water and boil for 25 minutes.
  2. While the potatoes are boiling, prepare the honey mustard mayo:
    • Blend together egg white, vinegar, Dijon mustard, and vegetable oil until emulsified.
    • Add honey Dijon mustard, whole grain mustard, garlic powder, sweet paprika, salt, and pepper and blend again.
  3. Prepare the seasoning:
    • Combine onion powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, mustard powder, ground fennel, salt, and pepper and mix well.
  4. When the potatoes are fork tender, drain them and let them cool slightly.
  5. Transfer the potatoes to two prepared baking trays and smash them with the bottom of a cup, making them nice and thin.
  6. Drizzle a little bit of oil over the smashed potatoes.
  7. Sprinkle the prepared seasoning over the potatoes.
  8. Bake in the oven at 180°C for 45 minutes.
  9. Remove the potatoes from the oven, flip them over, and bake for another 20 minutes.
  10. Serve the crispy smashed potatoes with a dollop of honey mustard mayo, a sprinkle of sea salt flakes, and some flat leaf parsley.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oZA1XRCf5Uc

crystallized_nuts.txt - Crystallized Nuts

Objectives

  • Learn how to make a delicious and easy crystallized nut snack.
  • Understand the science behind sugar crystallization.
  • Master the technique for creating a perfect crunchy coating on nuts.

Ingredients

  • 170 grams (6 ounces) pistachio nuts (or any nut of your choice)
  • 120 milliliters (4 fluid ounces) cold water
  • 170 grams (6 ounces) caster sugar (granulated white sugar also works)

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius (350 degrees Fahrenheit).
  2. Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
  3. Spread 170 grams of pistachio nuts (or your chosen nut) on the tray, ensuring they are not overlapping.
  4. Roast the nuts in the preheated oven for 6 minutes to release their oils and enhance their flavor.
  5. Carefully remove the nuts from the oven and turn off the oven.
  6. Transfer the nuts to a heat-resistant surface.
  7. Fold the corners of the parchment paper to centralize the nuts on the tray.
  8. Lift the parchment paper from each corner to create a funnel and let the nuts glide into a small bowl or jug.
  9. Place a medium to large saucepan on the stovetop.
  10. Add 120 milliliters of cold water and 170 grams of caster sugar to the saucepan.
  11. Stir the sugar and water mixture to ensure the sugar is fully submerged.
  12. Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat.
  13. Allow the mixture to boil for 5-6 minutes, until you see slight browning on the edges.
  14. Do not touch the mixture during this time, as it is forming the base for toffee and we don't want to create crystals.
  15. After 6 minutes, add the roasted nuts to the boiling sugar mixture.
  16. Stir the mixture continuously with a wooden spoon for 2-3 minutes to incorporate air and start the crystallization process.
  17. Continue stirring to prevent the mixture from solidifying into a single clump.
  18. As the mixture cooks, you will see a foam forming around the nuts, indicating the crystallization process is underway.
  19. Stir vigorously during this stage to prevent burning.
  20. Continue stirring until the nuts sound like pebbles or rocks in the saucepan, indicating complete crystallization.
  21. Immediately remove the saucepan from the heat.
  22. Pour the crystallized nuts onto the same baking tray lined with parchment paper.
  23. Spread the nuts out to cool.
  24. Allow the nuts to cool completely to allow the crystallized sugar to set and create a crunchy texture.
  25. Once the nuts have cooled, pour them through the parchment paper funnel into a clean glass jar or airtight container.
  26. Store the crystallized nuts in a cool, dark place.
  27. Do not store in the refrigerator, as this can cause the sugar to melt.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ml0BzcvdPoo

cucumber_salads.txt - 3 Cucumber Salads

Objectives

  • Make 3 different cucumber salads
  • Learn the viral cucumber salad recipe
  • Try a Korean-inspired cucumber salad
  • Learn a cucumber salad recipe from a cookbook
  • Decide which cucumber salad is best

Ingredients

Viral Cucumber Salad - 1 large cucumber - 1/2 red onion - 2 g fresh dill - 2 tsp capers - 2 tbsp cream cheese - 80 g smoked salmon - Salt and pepper to taste - MSG (optional)

Korean-inspired Cucumber Salad - 1 large cucumber - 2 spring onions - 2 g coriander - 2 tbsp light soy sauce - 2.5 tbsp rice wine vinegar - 2 tbsp toasted sesame oil - 1.5 tsp gochugaru (Korean chili powder) - 2 tbsp sesame seeds - 2 tsp honey - Ground white pepper (optional)

Cucumber, Tomato & Onion Salad - 1 large cucumber - 250 g cherry tomatoes - 1/2 red onion - 2 g dill, parsley, and mint - 2 tbsp red wine vinegar - 1.5 tsp onion powder - 1 clove garlic - 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil - Sea salt flakes - Cracked black pepper

Instructions

  1. Viral Cucumber Salad:
    • Slice the cucumber into thin rounds.
    • Thinly slice the red onion.
    • Roughly chop the dill and capers.
    • Combine all ingredients in a bowl, including cream cheese, smoked salmon, and seasonings.
    • Mix well and serve.
  2. Korean-inspired Cucumber Salad:
    • Slice the cucumber into thicker rounds (about 1 cm).
    • Thinly slice the spring onions.
    • Roughly chop the coriander.
    • In a separate bowl, combine the soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, gochugaru, sesame seeds, honey, and optional white pepper.
    • Combine the cucumber, spring onions, and coriander with the sauce and mix well.
    • Serve immediately.
  3. Cucumber, Tomato & Onion Salad:
    • Cut the cucumber in half lengthwise, then into quarters, and then into triangle pieces.
    • Slice the cherry tomatoes in half.
    • Thinly slice the red onion.
    • Tear the dill, parsley, and mint.
    • In a separate bowl, combine the red wine vinegar, onion powder, and garlic.
    • Slowly drizzle in the olive oil while whisking to create a vinaigrette.
    • Combine all ingredients in a bowl, including the vinaigrette, salt, and pepper.
    • Mix well and serve.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A4TV51IDgRM

custard_glaze.txt - Custard Glaze (Cremon Glaze)

Objectives

  • Create a creamy and flavorful custard glaze.
  • Learn how to infuse vanilla beans for enhanced flavor.
  • Master the technique of thickening custard over low heat.

Ingredients

  • 400 milliliters full fat milk
  • 200 milliliters thickened cream
  • 1 vanilla pod
  • 4 large egg yolks
  • 90 grams unrefined caster sugar

Instructions

  1. Add 400 milliliters of full fat milk and 200 milliliters of thickened cream to a saucepan.
  2. Slice a vanilla pod in half, scrape out the seeds, and add both the seeds and the remaining pod to the saucepan.
  3. Place the saucepan over medium heat and whisk to combine.
  4. Heat the mixture just under simmering point.
  5. Remove the saucepan from the stovetop.
  6. In a mixing bowl, whisk together 4 large egg yolks and 90 grams of unrefined caster sugar until the mixture is pale, creamy, and smooth.
  7. Carefully pour the warmed milk and cream mixture into the egg yolk and sugar mixture, using the whisk to hold back the vanilla pods.
  8. Gently whisk to combine until the mixture is smooth.
  9. Pour the mixture back into the saucepan, scraping in the vanilla seeds.
  10. Gently mix the custard over low heat for 5-6 minutes, using a whisk or spatula, until it starts to form ribbons and thickly coats the spatula or spoon.
  11. Remove the custard from the stovetop and immediately transfer it to a bottle or bowl.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G1QE586pLtg

deboning_chicken.txt - Deboning a Chicken

Objectives

blocked: candidate: FinishReasonSafety

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8dYYcoXPijU

dehydrated_fruit.txt - Dehydrated Fruit

Objectives

  • Learn how to dehydrate fruit for use in drinks or desserts
  • Understand the process and equipment needed for dehydrating fruit
  • Learn how to store dehydrated fruit for long-term use

Ingredients

  • Fruit of choice (e.g., lemons, limes, oranges)

Instructions

  1. Wash and thinly slice the fruit of your choice, ensuring all slices are the same size.
  2. Lay the fruit slices on a dehydrating rack, ensuring they are not overlapping.
  3. Place the rack in a dehydrator, lock it in place, and set the temperature to 50 degrees Celsius.
  4. Dehydrate for 18 hours.
  5. Check the fruit halfway through the process for desired crispiness.
  6. Once dehydrated, carefully remove the fruit from the rack and place it in a sterilized jar or clean container.
  7. Store in a cool, dark place for up to one year.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2RCRSi9AF5E

diced_onion.txt - Diced Onion

Objectives

  • Learn the most efficient way to dice an onion.
  • Preserve the root for stock.
  • Minimize waste during the dicing process.

Ingredients

  • 1 onion

Instructions

  1. Slice off the tip of the onion, leaving the root intact.
  2. Slice through the root to easily peel off the skin.
  3. Save the skin for stock.
  4. Make thin slices across the onion, stopping just before the root.
  5. Rotate the onion 90 degrees.
  6. Make a slice through the center of the onion, again stopping just before the root.
  7. Cut through the onion with your knife to achieve a consistent dice.
  8. Trim off any excess flesh from the root.
  9. Save the root for stock.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BwsKl1MTFDk

dig_in_cookbook.txt - Dig In Cookbook

Objectives

  • Announce the release of the "Dig In" cookbook
  • Express gratitude to fans for their support
  • Encourage pre-orders and sharing of recipes

Instructions

  1. Visit the link in the video description to pre-order the "Dig In" cookbook.
  2. Cook recipes from the cookbook and tag the creator in social media posts.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3X54_wuKzEs

dill_pickles.txt - Dill Pickles

Objectives

  • Learn to make quick and easy dill pickles at home.
  • Understand the basic ingredients and process for pickling cucumbers.
  • Discover how to create a flavorful brine for delicious pickles.

Ingredients

  • 100 milliliters (3.3 fluid ounces) cold water
  • 150 milliliters (5 fluid ounces) white wine vinegar
  • 50 grams (1.7 ounces) white granulated sugar
  • 1 small to medium-sized Lebanese cucumber (or half a continental cucumber)
  • 8 grams (0.2 ounces) fresh dill
  • 1 teaspoon (5 grams) sea salt flakes

Instructions

  1. Place a small saucepan on the stovetop.
  2. Add 100 milliliters (3.3 fluid ounces) of cold water, 150 milliliters (5 fluid ounces) of white wine vinegar, and 50 grams (1.7 ounces) of white granulated sugar to the saucepan.
  3. Stir the mixture to dissolve the sugar.
  4. Heat the mixture on high heat until it simmers.
  5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for 10 minutes.
  6. While the brine cools, slice off both ends of the cucumber and compost them.
  7. Slice the cucumber in half lengthwise, then into thin strips about half a centimeter thick.
  8. Place the cucumber strips in a mixing bowl.
  9. Chop the dill into rough pieces and add it to the bowl with the cucumber.
  10. Add 1 teaspoon (5 grams) of sea salt flakes to the bowl.
  11. Mix the cucumber, dill, and salt together with your hands or tongs to distribute the ingredients evenly.
  12. Transfer the cucumber mixture to a clean, sterilized jar, packing it tightly.
  13. Pour the cooled pickling brine over the cucumber mixture, completely filling the jar and covering everything.
  14. Securely place a lid on the jar while the brine is still hot.
  15. Place the jar in the refrigerator and let it sit for one day or until completely cold.
  16. Enjoy the delicious dill pickles.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eNu2YINQ6So

double_bacon_cheeseburger.txt - Double Bacon Cheeseburger

Objectives

  • Create a delicious double bacon cheeseburger with a homemade burger sauce.
  • Prepare ingredients like onion rings, tomato slices, and dill pickle mayo.
  • Learn to cook juicy beef patties and crispy bacon.

Ingredients

English | Chinese ------- | -------- 1 white onion | 一個白洋蔥 3-4 large leaves of cos lettuce | 3-4 片羅馬生菜 1 large tomato | 一個大番茄 4 large leaves of cos lettuce | 4 片洗淨的生菜葉 3 strips of dill pickles | 3 條酸黃瓜 200 ml flavorless olive oil | 200 毫升無味橄欖油 1 whole egg | 一個全蛋 1.5 tsp white vinegar | 1.5 茶匙白醋 1 tsp Dijon mustard | 1 茶匙第戎芥末醬 1 tsp onion powder | 1 茶匙洋蔥粉 1 tsp garlic powder | 1 茶匙大蒜粉 1 tsp regular paprika | 1 茶匙普通辣椒粉 2 tbsp tomato ketchup | 2 湯匙番茄醬 1 tsp American mustard | 1 茶匙美式芥末醬 500g beef mince (18% fat) | 500 克牛肉絞肉 (18% 脂肪) 1 tsp onion powder | 1 茶匙洋蔥粉 1 tsp garlic powder | 1 茶匙大蒜粉 2 tsp regular paprika | 2 茶匙普通辣椒粉 1.5 tsp sea salt flakes | 1.5 茶匙海鹽片 20 cracks black pepper | 20 次黑胡椒粉 8 rashers streaky bacon | 8 片煙燻培根 1 tbsp olive oil | 1 湯匙橄欖油 Cheese of your choice (e.g. Red Leicester, American cheddar) | 你喜歡的起司 (例如：紅萊斯特郡起司、美國切達起司) Burger buns of your choice (e.g. seeded brioche) | 你喜歡的漢堡麵包 (例如：芝麻布里歐麵包) Pinch of sea salt flakes | 一點海鹽片

Instructions

  1. Slice the white onion into rings for the finished burger.
  2. Dice the remaining onion into fine pieces for the burger sauce.
  3. Slice the tomato into even pieces.
  4. Wash and lightly dry the cos lettuce leaves.
  5. Thinly slice the dill pickles and dice them into small pieces.
  6. In a tall jar, combine olive oil, egg, white vinegar, and Dijon mustard.
  7. Blend the mixture with an immersion blender until smooth and thick.
  8. Transfer the mayonnaise to a clean bowl.
  9. Add onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, ketchup, American mustard, diced onion, and diced pickle to the mayonnaise.
  10. Mix well and season with salt and pepper.
  11. Refrigerate the burger sauce.
  12. Combine beef mince, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper in a mixing bowl.
  13. Gently mix the ingredients until the seasoning is evenly distributed.
  14. Divide the beef mixture into four equal patties.
  15. Shape the patties into balls and then flatten them with your hands.
  16. Set the patties aside.
  17. Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F).
  18. Lay the bacon rashers on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
  19. Bake for 10 minutes or until cooked to your liking.
  20. Heat a large pan over high heat.
  21. Add olive oil to the pan.
  22. Sear the patties for 1.5-2 minutes per side, or until golden brown.
  23. Flip the patties and immediately place cheese on top.
  24. Cook for another minute until the cheese melts.
  25. Remove the patties from the pan and let them rest for 2-3 minutes.
  26. Toast the burger buns in the oven for 1 minute per side.
  27. Spread burger sauce on both top and bottom buns.
  28. Layer the lettuce, tomato, patty, onion rings, bacon, and top bun.
  29. Enjoy your double bacon cheeseburger!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpzEROvL8I4

double_beef_double_cheese_smash_burger.txt - Double Beef Double Cheese Smash Burger

Objectives

  • Create a delicious and easy-to-make Smash Burger
  • Prepare a tangy sauce better than Big Mac sauce
  • Learn how to perfectly smash and cook beef patties

Ingredients

Sauce - 1/4 white or brown onion, diced finely - 3 slices dill pickles, diced - 1/2 cup mayonnaise - 2 tablespoons tomato ketchup - 2 1/2 teaspoons American yellow mustard - 1/2 teaspoon onion powder - 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder - 1 teaspoon smoked paprika - Juice of 1/4 lemon - Salt and pepper to taste

Burger - 500g 80% fat beef mince, divided into 4 portions - 1 teaspoon vegetable oil - 1 slice tomato - 4 burger buns - Sliced cheese (any kind) - Lettuce - Salt and pepper

Instructions

  1. Prepare the sauce: Dice the onion and pickles finely. Combine mayonnaise, ketchup, mustard, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, lemon juice, and seasoning in a bowl. Whisk until well combined. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
  2. Slice the tomato and set aside.
  3. Shape the beef mince into 4 balls.
  4. Heat a large pan over high heat. Add 1 teaspoon of vegetable oil and heat until smoking hot.
  5. Place two beef balls in the pan.
  6. Place a piece of parchment paper over the beef patties and press down with a spatula to flatten them.
  7. Season the patties well on one side.
  8. Cook the patties for about 2 minutes, until a crust forms.
  9. Flip the patties and cook for 1 minute.
  10. Add sliced cheese to the patties and cook for 30 seconds.
  11. Stack the cooked patties on top of each other and set aside.
  12. Toast the burger buns.
  13. Spread the prepared sauce on both sides of the toasted buns.
  14. Place a layer of lettuce on the bottom bun.
  15. Add the sliced tomato on top of the lettuce and season with salt and pepper.
  16. Place the double beef patties on top of the tomato.
  17. Add pickles, if desired.
  18. Place the top bun on the burger.
  19. Serve and enjoy.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5oWY2AFTL60

duck_fat_roasted_potatoes.txt - Duck Fat Roasted Potatoes with Rosemary Salt

Objectives

  • Learn to make crispy duck fat roasted potatoes with rosemary salt.
  • Discover a unique method for achieving extra crispy potatoes.
  • Master the art of making homemade rosemary salt.

Ingredients

  • 1.5 kg high starch potatoes
  • 5 g baking soda
  • Pinch of salt
  • 80 g duck fat (or goose fat or beef tallow)
  • 10 g rosemary leaves
  • Handful of sea salt flakes

Instructions

  1. Peel potatoes and save the peels for another recipe.
  2. Quarter potatoes, keeping them smaller for a crunchier texture.
  3. Bring a pot of water to a boil and add 5 g of baking soda and a pinch of salt.
  4. Add potatoes to boiling water and cook for 15 minutes until soft.
  5. Drain potatoes in a colander and fluff them up.
  6. Heat duck fat in a large roasting dish in a preheated oven at 190°C for 15 minutes until smoking hot.
  7. Carefully remove the roasting dish and gently place the potatoes in the hot fat.
  8. Roast potatoes for 1 hour, rotating the tray every 15 minutes.
  9. Make rosemary salt by grinding rosemary leaves and sea salt flakes in a mortar and pestle until finely combined.
  10. After 1 hour, remove potatoes from the oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes.
  11. Toss potatoes with rosemary salt in a bowl or directly in the roasting tray.
  12. Serve hot and enjoy!

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SXcl8Ip6Lw8

egg_salad_sandwich.txt - New York Deli Style Egg Salad Sandwich

Objectives

  • Learn to make a classic egg salad sandwich.
  • Discover the importance of using fresh ingredients.
  • Understand how to create a flavorful egg salad mixture.

Ingredients

  • 10 large free-range eggs
  • 5g (0.2 oz) fresh dill
  • 5g (0.2 oz) chives
  • 1 baby cos lettuce or baby Roma lettuce (optional)
  • 1/2 cup mayonnaise
  • 1 teaspoon (10g) Dijon mustard
  • 1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika (optional)
  • Salt and cracked black pepper to taste
  • Bread of choice (e.g., white loaf, sourdough)

Instructions

  1. Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat.
  2. Gently add 10 large free-range eggs to the boiling water.
  3. Cook the eggs for 10 minutes, then immediately transfer them to an ice bath to stop the cooking process.
  4. While the eggs are cooling, chop 5g (0.2 oz) of fresh dill and 5g (0.2 oz) of chives.
  5. If using lettuce, wash and peel it, removing any dirt.
  6. Once the eggs are cool, peel them and place them in a bowl.
  7. Add 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon (10g) Dijon mustard, and 1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika (optional) to the bowl.
  8. Season with salt and 15 cracks of black pepper.
  9. Use a potato masher to break up the egg yolks, leaving larger pieces of egg white for texture.
  10. Mix the ingredients thoroughly.
  11. Butter the bread of your choice.
  12. Spread a generous amount of egg salad mixture onto one slice of bread.
  13. Add lettuce or other desired toppings, such as tomato or onion.
  14. Place the other slice of bread on top.
  15. Slice the sandwich in half and enjoy.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-1Kovpx81w
